        <h1 class="border-bottom-0">Objects</h1> 
        <div class="d-none d-lg-block ml-2"> <button class="btn-link Link--secondary js-print tooltipped tooltipped-n" aria-label="Print this article"> <!-- From https://heroicons.dev/ -->

      <div id="article-contents" class="article-grid-body"> 
       <h3 id="about-objects"><a href="#about-objects">About objects</a></h3> 
       <p><a href="https://graphql.github.io/graphql-spec/June2018/#sec-Objects">Objects</a> in GraphQL represent the resources you can access. An object can contain a list of fields, which are specifically typed.</p> 
       <p>For example, the <a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository"><code>Repository</code></a> object has a field called <code>name</code>, which is a <code>String</code>.</p> 
       <p>For more information, see "<a href="/en/graphql/guides/introduction-to-graphql">Introduction to GraphQL</a>."</p>
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="actorlocation" class="pt-3"> <a href="#actorlocation">ActorLocation</a> </h3> 
         <p>Location information for an actor.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>city</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>City.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>country</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Country name.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>countryCode</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Country code.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>region</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Region name.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>regionCode</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Region or state code.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="addedtoprojectevent" class="pt-3"> <a href="#addedtoprojectevent">AddedToProjectEvent</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a<code>added_to_project</code>event on a given issue or pull request.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>project</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#project">Project</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Project referenced by event.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown note border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-info color-bg-info f5"> 
              <p><b>Preview notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>project</code> is available under the <a href="/en/graphql/overview/schema-previews#project-event-details-preview">Project event details preview</a>. During the preview period, the API may change without notice.</p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>projectCard</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#projectcard">ProjectCard</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Project card referenced by this project event.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown note border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-info color-bg-info f5"> 
              <p><b>Preview notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>projectCard</code> is available under the <a href="/en/graphql/overview/schema-previews#project-event-details-preview">Project event details preview</a>. During the preview period, the API may change without notice.</p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>projectColumnName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Column name referenced by this project event.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown note border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-info color-bg-info f5"> 
              <p><b>Preview notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>projectColumnName</code> is available under the <a href="/en/graphql/overview/schema-previews#project-event-details-preview">Project event details preview</a>. During the preview period, the API may change without notice.</p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="app" class="pt-3"> <a href="#app">App</a> </h3> 
         <p>A GitHub App.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>description</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The description of the app.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>logoBackgroundColor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The hex color code, without the leading '#', for the logo background.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>logoUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A URL pointing to the app's logo.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>size</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The size of the resulting image.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The name of the app.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>slug</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A slug based on the name of the app for use in URLs.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The URL to the app's homepage.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="assignedevent" class="pt-3"> <a href="#assignedevent">AssignedEvent</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents an<code>assigned</code>event on any assignable object.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>assignable</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#assignable">Assignable!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the assignable associated with the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>assignee</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#assignee">Assignee</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the user or mannequin that was assigned.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>user</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the user who was assigned.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown warning border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-danger color-bg-danger f5"> 
              <p><b>Deprecation notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>user</code> is deprecated. </p>
              <p>Assignees can now be mannequins. Use the <code>assignee</code> field instead. Removal on 2020-01-01 UTC.</p>
              <p></p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="automergedisabledevent" class="pt-3"> <a href="#automergedisabledevent">AutoMergeDisabledEvent</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a<code>auto_merge_disabled</code>event on a given pull request.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>disabler</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user who disabled auto-merge for this Pull Request.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pullRequest</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequest">PullRequest</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>PullRequest referenced by event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reason</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The reason auto-merge was disabled.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reasonCode</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The reason_code relating to why auto-merge was disabled.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="blamerange" class="pt-3"> <a href="#blamerange">BlameRange</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a range of information from a Git blame.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>age</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the recency of the change, from 1 (new) to 10 (old). This is calculated as a 2-quantile and determines the length of distance between the median age of all the changes in the file and the recency of the current range's change.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#commit">Commit!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the line author.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>endingLine</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The ending line for the range.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>startingLine</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The starting line for the range.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="blob" class="pt-3"> <a href="#blob">Blob</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a Git blob.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#gitobject">GitObject</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>abbreviatedOid</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>An abbreviated version of the Git object ID.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>byteSize</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Byte size of Blob object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commitResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this Git object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commitUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this Git object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isBinary</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Indicates whether the Blob is binary or text. Returns null if unable to determine the encoding.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isTruncated</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Indicates whether the contents is truncated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>oid</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#gitobjectid">GitObjectID!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The Git object ID.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The Repository the Git object belongs to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>text</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>UTF8 text data or null if the Blob is binary.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="bot" class="pt-3"> <a href="#bot">Bot</a> </h3> 
         <p>A special type of user which takes actions on behalf of GitHub Apps.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#uniformresourcelocatable">UniformResourceLocatable</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>avatarUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A URL pointing to the GitHub App's public avatar.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>size</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The size of the resulting square image.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>login</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The username of the actor.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this bot.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this bot.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="branchprotectionrule" class="pt-3"> <a href="#branchprotectionrule">BranchProtectionRule</a> </h3> 
         <p>A branch protection rule.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>allowsDeletions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can this branch be deleted.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>allowsForcePushes</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Are force pushes allowed on this branch.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>branchProtectionRuleConflicts</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#branchprotectionruleconflictconnection">BranchProtectionRuleConflictConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of conflicts matching branches protection rule and other branch protection rules.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p>

               <p></p> 
              </div>

           </tr>

            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>dismissesStaleReviews</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Will new commits pushed to matching branches dismiss pull request review approvals.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isAdminEnforced</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can admins overwrite branch protection.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>matchingRefs</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#refconnection">RefConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Repository refs that are protected by this rule.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>query</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Filters refs with query on name.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pattern</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the protection rule pattern.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pushAllowances</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pushallowanceconnection">PushAllowanceConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list push allowances for this branch protection rule.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p>

               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository associated with this branch protection rule.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>requiredApprovingReviewCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Number of approving reviews required to update matching branches.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>requiredStatusCheckContexts</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">[String]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>List of required status check contexts that must pass for commits to be accepted to matching branches.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>requiresApprovingReviews</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Are approving reviews required to update matching branches.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>requiresCodeOwnerReviews</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Are reviews from code owners required to update matching branches.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>requiresCommitSignatures</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Are commits required to be signed.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>requiresLinearHistory</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Are merge commits prohibited from being pushed to this branch.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>requiresStatusChecks</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Are status checks required to update matching branches.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>requiresStrictStatusChecks</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Are branches required to be up to date before merging.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>restrictsPushes</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Is pushing to matching branches restricted.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>restrictsReviewDismissals</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Is dismissal of pull request reviews restricted.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reviewDismissalAllowances</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#reviewdismissalallowanceconnection">ReviewDismissalAllowanceConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list review dismissal allowances for this branch protection rule.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p> 
              </div>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="cwe" class="pt-3"> <a href="#cwe">CWE</a> </h3> 
         <p>A common weakness enumeration.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>cweId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The id of the CWE.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>description</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A detailed description of this CWE.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>id</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#id">ID!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>ID of the object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The name of this CWE.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="checkrun" class="pt-3"> <a href="#checkrun">CheckRun</a> </h3> 
         <p>A check run.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#requirablebypullrequest">RequirableByPullRequest</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#uniformresourcelocatable">UniformResourceLocatable</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>annotations</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#checkannotationconnection">CheckAnnotationConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The check run's annotations.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>checkSuite</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#checksuite">CheckSuite!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The check suite that this run is a part of.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>completedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the check run was completed.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>conclusion</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#checkconclusionstate">CheckConclusionState</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The conclusion of the check run.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>detailsUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The URL from which to find full details of the check run on the integrator's site.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>externalId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A reference for the check run on the integrator's system.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isRequired</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this is required to pass before merging for a specific pull request.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>pullRequestId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#id">ID</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The id of the pull request this is required for.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>pullRequestNumber</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The number of the pull request this is required for.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The name of the check for this check run.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>permalink</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The permalink to the check run summary.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository associated with this check run.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this check run.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>startedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the check run was started.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>status</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#checkstatusstate">CheckStatusState!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The current status of the check run.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>summary</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A string representing the check run's summary.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>text</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A string representing the check run's text.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>title</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A string representing the check run.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this check run.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="checksuite" class="pt-3"> <a href="#checksuite">CheckSuite</a> </h3> 
         <p>A check suite.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>app</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#app">App</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The GitHub App which created this check suite.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>branch</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#ref">Ref</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The name of the branch for this check suite.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>checkRuns</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#checkrunconnection">CheckRunConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The check runs associated with a check suite.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>filterBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#checkrunfilter">CheckRunFilter</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Filters the check runs by this type.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#commit">Commit!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The commit for this check suite.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>conclusion</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#checkconclusionstate">CheckConclusionState</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The conclusion of this check suite.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>matchingPullRequests</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequestconnection">PullRequestConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of open pull requests matching the check suite.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>baseRefName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The base ref name to filter the pull requests by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>headRefName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The head ref name to filter the pull requests by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>labels</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">[String!]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>A list of label names to filter the pull requests by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#issueorder">IssueOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for pull requests returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>states</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#pullrequeststate">[PullRequestState!]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>A list of states to filter the pull requests by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>push</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#push">Push</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The push that triggered this check suite.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository associated with this check suite.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this check suite.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>status</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#checkstatusstate">CheckStatusState!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The status of this check suite.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this check suite.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="commit" class="pt-3"> <a href="#commit">Commit</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a Git commit.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#gitobject">GitObject</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#subscribable">Subscribable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#uniformresourcelocatable">UniformResourceLocatable</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>abbreviatedOid</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>An abbreviated version of the Git object ID.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>additions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The number of additions in this commit.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>associatedPullRequests</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequestconnection">PullRequestConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The merged Pull Request that introduced the commit to the repository. If the commit is not present in the default branch, additionally returns open Pull Requests associated with the commit.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#pullrequestorder">PullRequestOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for pull requests.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>author</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#gitactor">GitActor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Authorship details of the commit.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>authoredByCommitter</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the committer and the author match.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>authoredDate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The datetime when this commit was authored.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>authors</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#gitactorconnection">GitActorConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The list of authors for this commit based on the git author and the Co-authored-by message trailer. The git author will always be first.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>blame</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#blame">Blame!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Fetches <code>git blame</code> information.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>path</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The file whose Git blame information you want.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>changedFiles</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The number of changed files in this commit.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>checkSuites</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#checksuiteconnection">CheckSuiteConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The check suites associated with a commit.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>filterBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#checksuitefilter">CheckSuiteFilter</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Filters the check suites by this type.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>comments</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#commitcommentconnection">CommitCommentConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Comments made on the commit.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commitResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this Git object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commitUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this Git object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>committedDate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The datetime when this commit was committed.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>committedViaWeb</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if committed via GitHub web UI.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>committer</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#gitactor">GitActor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Committer details of the commit.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>deletions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The number of deletions in this commit.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>deployments</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#deploymentconnection">DeploymentConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The deployments associated with a commit.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>environments</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">[String!]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Environments to list deployments for.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#deploymentorder">DeploymentOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for deployments returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>file</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#treeentry">TreeEntry</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The tree entry representing the file located at the given path.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p>

               <p>The path for the file.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>history</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#commithistoryconnection">CommitHistoryConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The linear commit history starting from (and including) this commit, in the same order as <code>git log</code>.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>author</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#commitauthor">CommitAuthor</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters history to only show commits with matching authorship.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>path</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters history to only show commits touching files under this path.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>since</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#gittimestamp">GitTimestamp</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Allows specifying a beginning time or date for fetching commits.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>until</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#gittimestamp">GitTimestamp</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Allows specifying an ending time or date for fetching commits.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>message</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td>

               <p></p> 
              </div>

               <p></p>

         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="commitcomment" class="pt-3"> <a href="#commitcomment">CommitComment</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a comment on a given Commit.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#comment">Comment</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#deletable">Deletable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#minimizable">Minimizable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#reactable">Reactable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#repositorynode">RepositoryNode</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatable">Updatable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatablecomment">UpdatableComment</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>author</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The actor who authored the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>authorAssociation</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#commentauthorassociation">CommentAuthorAssociation!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Author's association with the subject of the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>body</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the comment body.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bodyHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#html">HTML!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

           </tr>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isMinimized</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>position</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>publishedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies when the comment was published at.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reactionGroups</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#reactiongroup">[ReactionGroup!]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of reactions grouped by content left on the subject.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reactions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#reactionconnection">ReactionConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of Reactions left on the Issue.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>content</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#reactioncontent">ReactionContent</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Allows filtering Reactions by emoji.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#reactionorder">ReactionOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Allows specifying the order in which reactions are returned.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository associated with this node.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path permalink for this commit comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL permalink for this commit comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>userContentEdits</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#usercontenteditconnection">UserContentEditConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of edits to this content.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanDelete</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the current viewer can delete this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanMinimize</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the current viewer can minimize this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanReact</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can user react to this subject.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanUpdate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the current viewer can update this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCannotUpdateReasons</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#commentcannotupdatereason">[CommentCannotUpdateReason!]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Reasons why the current viewer can not update this comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerDidAuthor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Did the viewer author this comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

               <p></p>

         <h3 id="commitcontributionsbyrepository" class="pt-3"> <a href="#commitcontributionsbyrepository">CommitContributionsByRepository</a> </h3>
