        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>contributions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#createdcommitcontributionconnection">CreatedCommitContributionConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The commit contributions, each representing a day.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for commit contributions returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td>

           </tr>

            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for the user's commits to the repository in this time range.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li>

            <th>Description</th>

            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>subject</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#referencedsubject">ReferencedSubject!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Issue or pull request which was connected.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="contributioncalendar" class="pt-3"> <a href="#contributioncalendar">ContributionCalendar</a> </h3> 
         <p>A calendar of contributions made on GitHub by a user.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>colors</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">[String!]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of hex color codes used in this calendar. The darker the color, the more contributions it represents.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isHalloween</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Determine if the color set was chosen because it's currently Halloween.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>months</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#contributioncalendarmonth">[ContributionCalendarMonth!]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of the months of contributions in this calendar.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalContributions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The count of total contributions in the calendar.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>weeks</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#contributioncalendarweek">[ContributionCalendarWeek!]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of the weeks of contributions in this calendar.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="contributioncalendarday" class="pt-3"> <a href="#contributioncalendarday">ContributionCalendarDay</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a single day of contributions on GitHub by a user.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>color</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The hex color code that represents how many contributions were made on this day compared to others in the calendar.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>contributionCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How many contributions were made by the user on this day.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>contributionLevel</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#contributionlevel">ContributionLevel!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Indication of contributions, relative to other days. Can be used to indicate which color to represent this day on a calendar.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>date</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#date">Date!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The day this square represents.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>weekday</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A number representing which day of the week this square represents, e.g., 1 is Monday.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="contributioncalendarmonth" class="pt-3"> <a href="#contributioncalendarmonth">ContributionCalendarMonth</a> </h3> 
         <p>A month of contributions in a user's contribution graph.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>firstDay</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#date">Date!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The date of the first day of this month.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The name of the month.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalWeeks</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How many weeks started in this month.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>year</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The year the month occurred in.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="contributioncalendarweek" class="pt-3"> <a href="#contributioncalendarweek">ContributionCalendarWeek</a> </h3>

         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="contributionscollection" class="pt-3"> <a href="#contributionscollection">ContributionsCollection</a> </h3> 
         <p>A contributions collection aggregates contributions such as opened issues and commits created by a user.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commitContributionsByRepository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#commitcontributionsbyrepository">[CommitContributionsByRepository!]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Commit contributions made by the user, grouped by repository.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>maxRepositories</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>How many repositories should be included.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>25</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>contributionCalendar</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#contributioncalendar">ContributionCalendar!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A calendar of this user's contributions on GitHub.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>contributionYears</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">[Int!]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The years the user has been making contributions with the most recent year first.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>doesEndInCurrentMonth</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Determine if this collection's time span ends in the current month.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>earliestRestrictedContributionDate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#date">Date</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The date of the first restricted contribution the user made in this time period. Can only be non-null when the user has enabled private contribution counts.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>endedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The ending date and time of this collection.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>firstIssueContribution</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#createdissueorrestrictedcontribution">CreatedIssueOrRestrictedContribution</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The first issue the user opened on GitHub. This will be null if that issue was opened outside the collection's time range and ignoreTimeRange is false. If the issue is not visible but the user has opted to show private contributions, a RestrictedContribution will be returned.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>firstPullRequestContribution</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#createdpullrequestorrestrictedcontribution">CreatedPullRequestOrRestrictedContribution</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The first pull request the user opened on GitHub. This will be null if that pull request was opened outside the collection's time range and ignoreTimeRange is not true. If the pull request is not visible but the user has opted to show private contributions, a RestrictedContribution will be returned.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>firstRepositoryContribution</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#createdrepositoryorrestrictedcontribution">CreatedRepositoryOrRestrictedContribution</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The first repository the user created on GitHub. This will be null if that first repository was created outside the collection's time range and ignoreTimeRange is false. If the repository is not visible, then a RestrictedContribution is returned.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>hasActivityInThePast</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Does the user have any more activity in the timeline that occurred prior to the collection's time range?.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>hasAnyContributions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Determine if there are any contributions in this collection.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>hasAnyRestrictedContributions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Determine if the user made any contributions in this time frame whose details are not visible because they were made in a private repository. Can only be true if the user enabled private contribution counts.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isSingleDay</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not the collector's time span is all within the same day.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>issueContributions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#createdissuecontributionconnection">CreatedIssueContributionConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of issues the user opened.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>excludeFirst</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Should the user's first issue ever be excluded from the result.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>excludePopular</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Should the user's most commented issue be excluded from the result.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#contributionorder">ContributionOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for contributions returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>issueContributionsByRepository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#issuecontributionsbyrepository">[IssueContributionsByRepository!]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Issue contributions made by the user, grouped by repository.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>excludeFirst</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Should the user's first issue ever be excluded from the result.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>excludePopular</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Should the user's most commented issue be excluded from the result.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>maxRepositories</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>How many repositories should be included.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>25</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>joinedGitHubContribution</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#joinedgithubcontribution">JoinedGitHubContribution</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>When the user signed up for GitHub. This will be null if that sign up date falls outside the collection's time range and ignoreTimeRange is false.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>latestRestrictedContributionDate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#date">Date</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The date of the most recent restricted contribution the user made in this time period. Can only be non-null when the user has enabled private contribution counts.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>mostRecentCollectionWithActivity</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#contributionscollection">ContributionsCollection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>When this collection's time range does not include any activity from the user, use this to get a different collection from an earlier time range that does have activity.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>mostRecentCollectionWithoutActivity</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#contributionscollection">ContributionsCollection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Returns a different contributions collection from an earlier time range than this one that does not have any contributions.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>popularIssueContribution</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#createdissuecontribution">CreatedIssueContribution</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The issue the user opened on GitHub that received the most comments in the specified time frame.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>popularPullRequestContribution</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#createdpullrequestcontribution">CreatedPullRequestContribution</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The pull request the user opened on GitHub that received the most comments in the specified time frame.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pullRequestContributions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#createdpullrequestcontributionconnection">CreatedPullRequestContributionConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Pull request contributions made by the user.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p>

               <p></p> 
              </div>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td>

            <td><p><code>pullRequestReviewContributions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#createdpullrequestreviewcontributionconnection">CreatedPullRequestReviewContributionConnection!</a></code>)</p></td>

            <td><p></p><p>Pull request review contributions made by the user, grouped by repository.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5">

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repositoryContributions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#createdrepositorycontributionconnection">CreatedRepositoryContributionConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of repositories owned by the user that the user created in this time range.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>excludeFirst</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Should the user's first repository ever be excluded from the result.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#contributionorder">ContributionOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for contributions returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>restrictedContributionsCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A count of contributions made by the user that the viewer cannot access. Only non-zero when the user has chosen to share their private contribution counts.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>startedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The beginning date and time of this collection.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalCommitContributions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How many commits were made by the user in this time span.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalIssueContributions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How many issues the user opened.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>excludeFirst</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Should the user's first issue ever be excluded from this count.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>excludePopular</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Should the user's most commented issue be excluded from this count.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalPullRequestContributions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How many pull requests the user opened.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>excludeFirst</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Should the user's first pull request ever be excluded from this count.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>excludePopular</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Should the user's most commented pull request be excluded from this count.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalPullRequestReviewContributions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How many pull request reviews the user left.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalRepositoriesWithContributedCommits</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How many different repositories the user committed to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalRepositoriesWithContributedIssues</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How many different repositories the user opened issues in.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>excludeFirst</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Should the user's first issue ever be excluded from this count.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>excludePopular</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Should the user's most commented issue be excluded from this count.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalRepositoriesWithContributedPullRequestReviews</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How many different repositories the user left pull request reviews in.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalRepositoriesWithContributedPullRequests</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How many different repositories the user opened pull requests in.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>excludeFirst</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Should the user's first pull request ever be excluded from this count.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>excludePopular</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Should the user's most commented pull request be excluded from this count.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalRepositoryContributions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How many repositories the user created.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>excludeFirst</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Should the user's first repository ever be excluded from this count.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>user</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user who made the contributions in this collection.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

           </tr>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="createdcommitcontribution" class="pt-3"> <a href="#createdcommitcontribution">CreatedCommitContribution</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents the contribution a user made by committing to a repository.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#contribution">Contribution</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commitCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How many commits were made on this day to this repository by the user.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isRestricted</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this contribution is associated with a record you do not have access to. For example, your own 'first issue' contribution may have been made on a repository you can no longer access.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>occurredAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>When this contribution was made.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository the user made a commit in.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this contribution.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this contribution.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>user</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user who made this contribution.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr>

           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the total count of items in the connection.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="createdpullrequestcontribution" class="pt-3"> <a href="#createdpullrequestcontribution">CreatedPullRequestContribution</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents the contribution a user made on GitHub by opening a pull request.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#contribution">Contribution</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isRestricted</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this contribution is associated with a record you do not have access to. For example, your own 'first issue' contribution may have been made on a repository you can no longer access.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>occurredAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>When this contribution was made.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pullRequest</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequest">PullRequest!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The pull request that was opened.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this contribution.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this contribution.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>user</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user who made this contribution.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="crossreferencedevent" class="pt-3"> <a href="#crossreferencedevent">CrossReferencedEvent</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a mention made by one issue or pull request to another.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#uniformresourcelocatable">UniformResourceLocatable</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isCrossRepository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Reference originated in a different repository.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>referencedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies when the reference was made.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this pull request.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>source</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#referencedsubject">ReferencedSubject!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Issue or pull request that made the reference.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>target</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#referencedsubject">ReferencedSubject!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Issue or pull request to which the reference was made.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this pull request.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>willCloseTarget</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Checks if the target will be closed when the source is merged.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="demilestonedevent" class="pt-3"> <a href="#demilestonedevent">DemilestonedEvent</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a<code>demilestoned</code>event on a given issue or pull request.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul>

          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>milestoneTitle</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the milestone title associated with the<code>demilestoned</code>event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>subject</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#milestoneitem">MilestoneItem!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Object referenced by event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="dependencygraphdependency" class="pt-3"> <a href="#dependencygraphdependency">DependencyGraphDependency</a> </h3> 
         <p>A dependency manifest entry.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <div class="extended-markdown note border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-info color-bg-info f5"> 
          <p><b>Preview notice</b></p> 
          <p><code>DependencyGraphDependency</code> is available under the <a href="/en/graphql/overview/schema-previews#access-to-a-repositories-dependency-graph-preview">Access to a repositories dependency graph preview</a>. During the preview period, the API may change without notice.</p> 
         </div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>hasDependencies</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Does the dependency itself have dependencies?.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>packageManager</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The dependency package manager.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>packageName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The required package name.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository containing the package.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>requirements</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The dependency version requirements.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="dependencygraphdependencyconnection" class="pt-3"> <a href="#dependencygraphdependencyconnection">DependencyGraphDependencyConnection</a> </h3> 
         <p>The connection type for DependencyGraphDependency.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <div class="extended-markdown note border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-info color-bg-info f5"> 
          <p><b>Preview notice</b></p> 
          <p><code>DependencyGraphDependencyConnection</code> is available under the <a href="/en/graphql/overview/schema-previews#access-to-a-repositories-dependency-graph-preview">Access to a repositories dependency graph preview</a>. During the preview period, the API may change without notice.</p> 
         </div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>edges</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#dependencygraphdependencyedge">[DependencyGraphDependencyEdge]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of edges.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>nodes</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#dependencygraphdependency">[DependencyGraphDependency]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of nodes.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pageInfo</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pageinfo">PageInfo!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Information to aid in pagination.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the total count of items in the connection.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="dependencygraphmanifest" class="pt-3"> <a href="#dependencygraphmanifest">DependencyGraphManifest</a> </h3> 
         <p>Dependency manifest for a repository.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <div class="extended-markdown note border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-info color-bg-info f5"> 
          <p><b>Preview notice</b></p> 
          <p><code>DependencyGraphManifest</code> is available under the <a href="/en/graphql/overview/schema-previews#access-to-a-repositories-dependency-graph-preview">Access to a repositories dependency graph preview</a>. During the preview period, the API may change without notice.</p> 
         </div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>blobPath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Path to view the manifest file blob.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>dependencies</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#dependencygraphdependencyconnection">DependencyGraphDependencyConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of manifest dependencies.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>dependenciesCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The number of dependencies listed in the manifest.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>exceedsMaxSize</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Is the manifest too big to parse?.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>filename</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Fully qualified manifest filename.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>parseable</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Were we able to parse the manifest?.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository containing the manifest.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="deployedevent" class="pt-3"> <a href="#deployedevent">DeployedEvent</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a<code>deployed</code>event on a given pull request.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>deployment</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#deployment">Deployment!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The deployment associated with the<code>deployed</code>event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pullRequest</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequest">PullRequest!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>PullRequest referenced by event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>ref</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#ref">Ref</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The ref associated with the<code>deployed</code>event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="deployment" class="pt-3"> <a href="#deployment">Deployment</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents triggered deployment instance.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#commit">Commit</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the commit sha of the deployment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commitOid</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the oid of the deployment commit, even if the commit has been deleted.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>creator</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who triggered the deployment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>description</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The deployment description.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>environment</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The latest environment to which this deployment was made.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>latestEnvironment</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The latest environment to which this deployment was made.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>latestStatus</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#deploymentstatus">DeploymentStatus</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The latest status of this deployment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>originalEnvironment</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The original environment to which this deployment was made.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>payload</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Extra information that a deployment system might need.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>ref</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#ref">Ref</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the Ref of the deployment, if the deployment was created by ref.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the repository associated with the deployment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>state</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#deploymentstate">DeploymentState</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The current state of the deployment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>statuses</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#deploymentstatusconnection">DeploymentStatusConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of statuses associated with the deployment.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>task</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The deployment task.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="deploymentstatus" class="pt-3"> <a href="#deploymentstatus">DeploymentStatus</a> </h3> 
         <p>Describes the status of a given deployment attempt.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul>

          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>creator</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who triggered the deployment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>deployment</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#deployment">Deployment!</a></code>)</p></td>

            <td><p><code>description</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td>

             <div class="extended-markdown note border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-info color-bg-info f5"> 
              <p><b>Preview notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>environment</code> is available under the <a href="/en/graphql/overview/schema-previews#deployments-preview">Deployments preview</a>. During the preview period, the API may change without notice.</p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>environmentUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td>

            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the current state of the deployment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="enterprise" class="pt-3"> <a href="#enterprise">Enterprise</a> </h3> 
         <p>An account to manage multiple organizations with consolidated policy and billing.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>avatarUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A URL pointing to the enterprise's public avatar.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>size</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The size of the resulting square image.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr>

             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>deployment</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#enterpriseuserdeployment">EnterpriseUserDeployment</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Only return members within the selected GitHub Enterprise deployment.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#enterprisememberorder">EnterpriseMemberOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for members returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>organizationLogins</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">[String!]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Only return members within the organizations with these logins.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>query</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The search string to look for.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p>
               <p>The role of the user in the enterprise organization or server.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr>

            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

               <p></p>

               <p></p> 
              </div>

           </tr>

               <p></p>

               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerIsAdmin</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Is the current viewer an admin of this enterprise?.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>websiteUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td>

         <h3 id="enterprisebillinginfo" class="pt-3"> <a href="#enterprisebillinginfo">EnterpriseBillingInfo</a> </h3> 
         <p>Enterprise billing information visible to enterprise billing managers and owners.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>allLicensableUsersCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>assetPacks</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>availableSeats</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The number of available seats across all owned organizations based on the unique number of billable users.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown warning border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-danger color-bg-danger f5"> 
              <p><b>Deprecation notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>availableSeats</code> is deprecated. </p>
              <p><code>availableSeats</code> will be replaced with <code>totalAvailableLicenses</code> to provide more clarity on the value being returned Use EnterpriseBillingInfo.totalAvailableLicenses instead. Removal on 2020-01-01 UTC.</p>
              <p></p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bandwidthQuota</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#float">Float!</a></code>)</p></td>

           <tr>

           </tr> 
           <tr>

           <tr>

             <div class="extended-markdown warning border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-danger color-bg-danger f5"> 
              <p><b>Deprecation notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>seats</code> is deprecated. </p>
              <p><code>seats</code> will be replaced with <code>totalLicenses</code> to provide more clarity on the value being returned Use EnterpriseBillingInfo.totalLicenses instead. Removal on 2020-01-01 UTC.</p>
              <p></p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>storageQuota</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#float">Float!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="enterpriseidentityprovider" class="pt-3"> <a href="#enterpriseidentityprovider">EnterpriseIdentityProvider</a> </h3> 
         <p>An identity provider configured to provision identities for an enterprise.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>digestMethod</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#samldigestalgorithm">SamlDigestAlgorithm</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The digest algorithm used to sign SAML requests for the identity provider.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>enterprise</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#enterprise">Enterprise</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The enterprise this identity provider belongs to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>externalIdentities</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#externalidentityconnection">ExternalIdentityConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>ExternalIdentities provisioned by this identity provider.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>idpCertificate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#x509certificate">X509Certificate</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The x509 certificate used by the identity provider to sign assertions and responses.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>issuer</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The Issuer Entity ID for the SAML identity provider.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>recoveryCodes</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">[String!]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Recovery codes that can be used by admins to access the enterprise if the identity provider is unavailable.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>signatureMethod</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#samlsignaturealgorithm">SamlSignatureAlgorithm</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The signature algorithm used to sign SAML requests for the identity provider.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>ssoUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The URL endpoint for the identity provider's SAML SSO.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

         <h3 id="enterpriseoutsidecollaboratorconnection" class="pt-3"> <a href="#enterpriseoutsidecollaboratorconnection">EnterpriseOutsideCollaboratorConnection</a> </h3>
