          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>edges</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#enterpriseoutsidecollaboratoredge">[EnterpriseOutsideCollaboratorEdge]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of edges.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>nodes</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">[User]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of nodes.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pageInfo</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pageinfo">PageInfo!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Information to aid in pagination.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the total count of items in the connection.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="enterpriseoutsidecollaboratoredge" class="pt-3"> <a href="#enterpriseoutsidecollaboratoredge">EnterpriseOutsideCollaboratorEdge</a> </h3> 
         <p>A User who is an outside collaborator of an enterprise through one or more organizations.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>cursor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isUnlicensed</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether the outside collaborator does not have a license for the enterprise.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown warning border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-danger color-bg-danger f5"> 
              <p><b>Deprecation notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>isUnlicensed</code> is deprecated. </p>
              <p>All outside collaborators consume a license Removal on 2021-01-01 UTC.</p>
              <p></p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>node</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The item at the end of the edge.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repositories</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#enterpriserepositoryinfoconnection">EnterpriseRepositoryInfoConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The enterprise organization repositories this user is a member of.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#repositoryorder">RepositoryOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for repositories.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#enterpriseadministratorinvitationorder">EnterpriseAdministratorInvitationOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for pending enterprise administrator invitations returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>query</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The search string to look for.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>role</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#enterpriseadministratorrole">EnterpriseAdministratorRole</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The role to filter by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="enterprisependingcollaboratorconnection" class="pt-3"> <a href="#enterprisependingcollaboratorconnection">EnterprisePendingCollaboratorConnection</a> </h3> 
         <p>The connection type for User.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4>

            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th>

            <td><p></p><p>A list of edges.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>nodes</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">[User]</a></code>)</p></td>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="enterprisependingcollaboratoredge" class="pt-3"> <a href="#enterprisependingcollaboratoredge">EnterprisePendingCollaboratorEdge</a> </h3> 
         <p>A user with an invitation to be a collaborator on a repository owned by an organization in an enterprise.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>cursor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isUnlicensed</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether the invited collaborator does not have a license for the enterprise.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown warning border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-danger color-bg-danger f5"> 
              <p><b>Deprecation notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>isUnlicensed</code> is deprecated. </p>
              <p>All pending collaborators consume a license Removal on 2021-01-01 UTC.</p>
              <p></p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>node</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The item at the end of the edge.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repositories</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#enterpriserepositoryinfoconnection">EnterpriseRepositoryInfoConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The enterprise organization repositories this user is a member of.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#repositoryorder">RepositoryOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for repositories.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

         <h3 id="enterpriseserveruseraccountconnection" class="pt-3"> <a href="#enterpriseserveruseraccountconnection">EnterpriseServerUserAccountConnection</a> </h3>

         <h4>Fields</h4>

          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th>

          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>edges</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#enterpriseserveruseraccountedge">[EnterpriseServerUserAccountEdge]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of edges.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pageInfo</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pageinfo">PageInfo!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Information to aid in pagination.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the total count of items in the connection.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="enterpriseuseraccount" class="pt-3"> <a href="#enterpriseuseraccount">EnterpriseUserAccount</a> </h3> 
         <p>An account for a user who is an admin of an enterprise or a member of an enterprise through one or more organizations.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>avatarUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A URL pointing to the enterprise user account's public avatar.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>size</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The size of the resulting square image.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>enterprise</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#enterprise">Enterprise!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The enterprise in which this user account exists.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>login</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>An identifier for the enterprise user account, a login or email address.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The name of the enterprise user account.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>organizations</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#enterpriseorganizationmembershipconnection">EnterpriseOrganizationMembershipConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of enterprise organizations this user is a member of.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#organizationorder">OrganizationOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for organizations returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>query</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The search string to look for.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>role</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#enterpriseuseraccountmembershiprole">EnterpriseUserAccountMembershipRole</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The role of the user in the enterprise organization.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this user.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="externalidentity" class="pt-3"> <a href="#externalidentity">ExternalIdentity</a> </h3> 
         <p>An external identity provisioned by SAML SSO or SCIM.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>guid</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The GUID for this identity.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>organizationInvitation</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#organizationinvitation">OrganizationInvitation</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Organization invitation for this SCIM-provisioned external identity.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>samlIdentity</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#externalidentitysamlattributes">ExternalIdentitySamlAttributes</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>SAML Identity attributes.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>scimIdentity</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#externalidentityscimattributes">ExternalIdentityScimAttributes</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>SCIM Identity attributes.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>user</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>User linked to this external identity. Will be NULL if this identity has not been claimed by an organization member.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

            <td><p></p><p>Information to aid in pagination.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the total count of items in the connection.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="gist" class="pt-3"> <a href="#gist">Gist</a> </h3> 
         <p>A Gist.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#starrable">Starrable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#uniformresourcelocatable">UniformResourceLocatable</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>comments</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#gistcommentconnection">GistCommentConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of comments associated with the gist.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>description</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The gist description.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>files</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#gistfile">[GistFile]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The files in this gist.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>limit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The maximum number of files to return.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>10</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>oid</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#gitobjectid">GitObjectID</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The oid of the files to return.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>forks</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#gistconnection">GistConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of forks associated with the gist.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#gistorder">GistOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for gists returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isFork</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies if the gist is a fork.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isPublic</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether the gist is public or not.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The gist name.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>owner</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#repositoryowner">RepositoryOwner</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The gist owner.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pushedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies when the gist was last pushed to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTML path to this resource.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>stargazerCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Returns a count of how many stargazers there are on this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>stargazers</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#stargazerconnection">StargazerConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of users who have starred this starrable.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#starorder">StarOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Order for connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this Gist.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerHasStarred</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Returns a boolean indicating whether the viewing user has starred this starrable.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="gistcomment" class="pt-3"> <a href="#gistcomment">GistComment</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a comment on an Gist.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#comment">Comment</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#deletable">Deletable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#minimizable">Minimizable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatable">Updatable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatablecomment">UpdatableComment</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>author</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The actor who authored the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>authorAssociation</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#commentauthorassociation">CommentAuthorAssociation!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Author's association with the gist.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>body</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the comment body.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bodyHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#html">HTML!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The body rendered to HTML.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bodyText</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The body rendered to text.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdViaEmail</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if this comment was created via an email reply.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>editor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The actor who edited the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>gist</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#gist">Gist!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The associated gist.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>includesCreatedEdit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if this comment was edited and includes an edit with the creation data.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isMinimized</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Returns whether or not a comment has been minimized.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>lastEditedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The moment the editor made the last edit.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>minimizedReason</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Returns why the comment was minimized.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>publishedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies when the comment was published at.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>userContentEdits</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#usercontenteditconnection">UserContentEditConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of edits to this content.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanDelete</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the current viewer can delete this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanMinimize</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the current viewer can minimize this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanUpdate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the current viewer can update this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCannotUpdateReasons</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#commentcannotupdatereason">[CommentCannotUpdateReason!]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Reasons why the current viewer can not update this comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerDidAuthor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Did the viewer author this comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

           </tr>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>encoding</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The gist file encoding.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>extension</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isImage</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isTruncated</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>language</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#language">Language</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The programming language this file is written in.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>size</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

            <td><p><code>text</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>UTF8 text data or null if the file is binary.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>truncate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Optionally truncate the returned file to this length.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="gitactor" class="pt-3"> <a href="#gitactor">GitActor</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents an actor in a Git commit (ie. an author or committer).</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>avatarUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A URL pointing to the author's public avatar.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>size</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The size of the resulting square image.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>date</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#gittimestamp">GitTimestamp</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The timestamp of the Git action (authoring or committing).</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>email</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The email in the Git commit.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The name in the Git commit.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>user</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The GitHub user corresponding to the email field. Null if no such user exists.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

           </tr>

           </tr>

           </tr>

         </table>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="gpgsignature" class="pt-3"> <a href="#gpgsignature">GpgSignature</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a GPG signature on a Commit or Tag.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#gitsignature">GitSignature</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>email</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Email used to sign this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isValid</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>True if the signature is valid and verified by GitHub.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>keyId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Hex-encoded ID of the key that signed this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>payload</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Payload for GPG signing object. Raw ODB object without the signature header.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>signature</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>ASCII-armored signature header from object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>signer</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>GitHub user corresponding to the email signing this commit.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>state</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#gitsignaturestate">GitSignatureState!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The state of this signature. <code>VALID</code> if signature is valid and verified by GitHub, otherwise represents reason why signature is considered invalid.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>wasSignedByGitHub</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>True if the signature was made with GitHub's signing key.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="headrefdeletedevent" class="pt-3"> <a href="#headrefdeletedevent">HeadRefDeletedEvent</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a<code>head_ref_deleted</code>event on a given pull request.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>headRef</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#ref">Ref</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the Ref associated with the <code>head_ref_deleted</code> event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr>

           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

         <h3 id="ipallowlistentry" class="pt-3"> <a href="#ipallowlistentry">IpAllowListEntry</a> </h3> 
         <p>An IP address or range of addresses that is allowed to access an owner's resources.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul>

            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>allowListValue</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A single IP address or range of IP addresses in CIDR notation.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isActive</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether the entry is currently active.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr>

            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

           </tr>

            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="issue" class="pt-3"> <a href="#issue">Issue</a> </h3> 
         <p>An Issue is a place to discuss ideas, enhancements, tasks, and bugs for a project.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#assignable">Assignable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#closable">Closable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#comment">Comment</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#labelable">Labelable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#lockable">Lockable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#reactable">Reactable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#repositorynode">RepositoryNode</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#subscribable">Subscribable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#uniformresourcelocatable">UniformResourceLocatable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatable">Updatable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatablecomment">UpdatableComment</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>activeLockReason</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#lockreason">LockReason</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Reason that the conversation was locked.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>assignees</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#userconnection">UserConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of Users assigned to this object.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>author</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The actor who authored the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>authorAssociation</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#commentauthorassociation">CommentAuthorAssociation!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Author's association with the subject of the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>body</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the body of the issue.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bodyHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#html">HTML!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The body rendered to HTML.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bodyResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The http path for this issue body.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bodyText</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the body of the issue rendered to text.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bodyUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The http URL for this issue body.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>closed</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p><code>true</code> if the object is closed (definition of closed may depend on type).</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>closedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was closed.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>comments</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#issuecommentconnection">IssueCommentConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of comments associated with the Issue.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#issuecommentorder">IssueCommentOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for issue comments returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdViaEmail</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if this comment was created via an email reply.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>editor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The actor who edited the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>hovercard</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#hovercard">Hovercard!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The hovercard information for this issue.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>includeNotificationContexts</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Whether or not to include notification contexts.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>true</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>includesCreatedEdit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if this comment was edited and includes an edit with the creation data.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isPinned</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Indicates whether or not this issue is currently pinned to the repository issues list.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isReadByViewer</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Is this issue read by the viewer.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>labels</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#labelconnection">LabelConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of labels associated with the object.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#labelorder">LabelOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for labels returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>lastEditedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The moment the editor made the last edit.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>locked</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p><code>true</code> if the object is locked.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>milestone</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#milestone">Milestone</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the milestone associated with the issue.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>number</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the issue number.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>participants</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#userconnection">UserConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of Users that are participating in the Issue conversation.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>projectCards</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#projectcardconnection">ProjectCardConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>List of project cards associated with this issue.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>archivedStates</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#projectcardarchivedstate">[ProjectCardArchivedState]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>A list of archived states to filter the cards by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>publishedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies when the comment was published at.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reactionGroups</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#reactiongroup">[ReactionGroup!]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of reactions grouped by content left on the subject.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reactions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#reactionconnection">ReactionConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of Reactions left on the Issue.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>content</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#reactioncontent">ReactionContent</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Allows filtering Reactions by emoji.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#reactionorder">ReactionOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Allows specifying the order in which reactions are returned.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository associated with this node.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>state</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#issuestate">IssueState!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>timeline</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#issuetimelineconnection">IssueTimelineConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of events, comments, commits, etc. associated with the issue.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown warning border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-danger color-bg-danger f5"> 
              <p><b>Deprecation notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>timeline</code> is deprecated. </p>
              <p><code>timeline</code> will be removed Use Issue.timelineItems instead. Removal on 2020-10-01 UTC.</p>
              <p></p> 
             </div> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>since</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Allows filtering timeline events by a <code>since</code> timestamp.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>timelineItems</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#issuetimelineitemsconnection">IssueTimelineItemsConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of events, comments, commits, etc. associated with the issue.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>itemTypes</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#issuetimelineitemsitemtype">[IssueTimelineItemsItemType!]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Filter timeline items by type.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>since</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Filter timeline items by a <code>since</code> timestamp.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>skip</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Skips the first <em>n</em> elements in the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>title</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the issue title.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>userContentEdits</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#usercontenteditconnection">UserContentEditConnection</a></code>)</p></td>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr>

            <td><p><code>viewerCanReact</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

           </tr>

            <td><p><code>viewerDidAuthor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="issuecomment" class="pt-3"> <a href="#issuecomment">IssueComment</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a comment on an Issue.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#comment">Comment</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#deletable">Deletable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#minimizable">Minimizable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#reactable">Reactable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#repositorynode">RepositoryNode</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatable">Updatable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatablecomment">UpdatableComment</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>author</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The actor who authored the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>authorAssociation</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#commentauthorassociation">CommentAuthorAssociation!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Author's association with the subject of the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>body</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The body as Markdown.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bodyHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#html">HTML!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

           </tr>

           </tr>

           </tr>

            <td><p><code>isMinimized</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>issue</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#issue">Issue!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pullRequest</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequest">PullRequest</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Returns the pull request associated with the comment, if this comment was made on a pull request.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reactionGroups</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#reactiongroup">[ReactionGroup!]</a></code>)</p></td>
