           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reactions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#reactionconnection">ReactionConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of Reactions left on the Issue.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>content</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#reactioncontent">ReactionContent</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Allows filtering Reactions by emoji.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#reactionorder">ReactionOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Allows specifying the order in which reactions are returned.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository associated with this node.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this issue comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this issue comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>userContentEdits</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#usercontenteditconnection">UserContentEditConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of edits to this content.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanDelete</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the current viewer can delete this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanMinimize</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the current viewer can minimize this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanReact</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can user react to this subject.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanUpdate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the current viewer can update this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCannotUpdateReasons</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#commentcannotupdatereason">[CommentCannotUpdateReason!]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Reasons why the current viewer can not update this comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerDidAuthor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Did the viewer author this comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="joinedgithubcontribution" class="pt-3"> <a href="#joinedgithubcontribution">JoinedGitHubContribution</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a user signing up for a GitHub account.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#contribution">Contribution</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isRestricted</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this contribution is associated with a record you do not have access to. For example, your own 'first issue' contribution may have been made on a repository you can no longer access.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>occurredAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>When this contribution was made.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this contribution.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this contribution.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>user</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user who made this contribution.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="label" class="pt-3"> <a href="#label">Label</a> </h3> 
         <p>A label for categorizing Issues or Milestones with a given Repository.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>color</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the label color.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the label was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>description</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A brief description of this label.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isDefault</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Indicates whether or not this is a default label.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>issues</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#issueconnection">IssueConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of issues associated with this label.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>filterBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#issuefilters">IssueFilters</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Filtering options for issues returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>labels</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">[String!]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>A list of label names to filter the pull requests by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#issueorder">IssueOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for issues returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>states</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#issuestate">[IssueState!]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>A list of states to filter the issues by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the label name.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pullRequests</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequestconnection">PullRequestConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of pull requests associated with this label.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>baseRefName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The base ref name to filter the pull requests by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>headRefName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The head ref name to filter the pull requests by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>labels</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">[String!]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>A list of label names to filter the pull requests by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#issueorder">IssueOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for pull requests returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>states</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#pullrequeststate">[PullRequestState!]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>A list of states to filter the pull requests by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository associated with this label.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this label.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the label was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this label.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="license" class="pt-3"> <a href="#license">License</a> </h3> 
         <p>A repository's open source license.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>body</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The full text of the license.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>conditions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#licenserule">[LicenseRule]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The conditions set by the license.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>description</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A human-readable description of the license.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>featured</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether the license should be featured.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>hidden</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether the license should be displayed in license pickers.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>implementation</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Instructions on how to implement the license.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>key</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The lowercased SPDX ID of the license.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>limitations</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#licenserule">[LicenseRule]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The limitations set by the license.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The license full name specified by <a href="https://spdx.org/licenses">https://spdx.org/licenses</a>.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>nickname</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Customary short name if applicable (e.g, GPLv3).</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>permissions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#licenserule">[LicenseRule]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The permissions set by the license.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pseudoLicense</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether the license is a pseudo-license placeholder (e.g., other, no-license).</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>spdxId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Short identifier specified by <a href="https://spdx.org/licenses">https://spdx.org/licenses</a>.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>URL to the license on <a href="https://choosealicense.com">https://choosealicense.com</a>.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="licenserule" class="pt-3"> <a href="#licenserule">LicenseRule</a> </h3> 
         <p>Describes a License's conditions, permissions, and limitations.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4>

            <th>Name</th>

            <td><p></p><p>A description of the rule.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>key</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The machine-readable rule key.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>label</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
          </tbody>

            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td>

           </tr> 
          </tbody>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="mannequin" class="pt-3"> <a href="#mannequin">Mannequin</a> </h3> 
         <p>A placeholder user for attribution of imported data on GitHub.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#uniformresourcelocatable">UniformResourceLocatable</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>avatarUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A URL pointing to the GitHub App's public avatar.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>size</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The size of the resulting square image.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>claimant</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user that has claimed the data attributed to this mannequin.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>email</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The mannequin's email on the source instance.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>login</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The username of the actor.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTML path to this resource.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The URL to this resource.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="markedasduplicateevent" class="pt-3"> <a href="#markedasduplicateevent">MarkedAsDuplicateEvent</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a<code>marked_as_duplicate</code>event on a given issue or pull request.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>canonical</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#issueorpullrequest">IssueOrPullRequest</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The authoritative issue or pull request which has been duplicated by another.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>duplicate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#issueorpullrequest">IssueOrPullRequest</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The issue or pull request which has been marked as a duplicate of another.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isCrossRepository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Canonical and duplicate belong to different repositories.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="marketplacecategory" class="pt-3"> <a href="#marketplacecategory">MarketplaceCategory</a> </h3> 
         <p>A public description of a Marketplace category.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul>

         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>description</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The category's description.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>howItWorks</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The technical description of how apps listed in this category work with GitHub.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The category's name.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>primaryListingCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How many Marketplace listings have this as their primary category.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this Marketplace category.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>secondaryListingCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How many Marketplace listings have this as their secondary category.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>slug</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The short name of the category used in its URL.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="marketplacelisting" class="pt-3"> <a href="#marketplacelisting">MarketplaceListing</a> </h3> 
         <p>A listing in the GitHub integration marketplace.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul>

          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr>

           </tr>

           </tr>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>configurationUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

           </tr>

           </tr>

           </tr>

           </tr>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isArchived</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this listing has been removed from the Marketplace.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isDraft</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this listing is still an editable draft that has not been submitted for review and is not publicly visible in the Marketplace.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isPaid</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether the product this listing represents is available as part of a paid plan.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isPublic</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this listing has been approved for display in the Marketplace.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isRejected</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this listing has been rejected by GitHub for display in the Marketplace.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isUnverified</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this listing has been approved for unverified display in the Marketplace.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isUnverifiedPending</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this draft listing has been submitted for review for approval to be unverified in the Marketplace.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isVerificationPendingFromDraft</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this draft listing has been submitted for review from GitHub for approval to be verified in the Marketplace.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isVerificationPendingFromUnverified</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this unverified listing has been submitted for review from GitHub for approval to be verified in the Marketplace.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isVerified</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this listing has been approved for verified display in the Marketplace.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>logoBackgroundColor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The hex color code, without the leading '#', for the logo background.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>logoUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>URL for the listing's logo image.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>size</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The size in pixels of the resulting square image.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>400</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The listing's full name.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>normalizedShortDescription</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The listing's very short description without a trailing period or ampersands.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pricingUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>URL to the listing's detailed pricing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>primaryCategory</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#marketplacecategory">MarketplaceCategory!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The category that best describes the listing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>privacyPolicyUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>URL to the listing's privacy policy, may return an empty string for listings that do not require a privacy policy URL.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>screenshotUrls</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">[String]!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>secondaryCategory</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#marketplacecategory">MarketplaceCategory</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>An alternate category that describes the listing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>shortDescription</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The listing's very short description.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>slug</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The short name of the listing used in its URL.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>statusUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>URL to the listing's status page.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>supportEmail</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>An email address for support for this listing's app.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>supportUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Either a URL or an email address for support for this listing's app, may return an empty string for listings that do not require a support URL.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>termsOfServiceUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>URL to the listing's terms of service.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for the Marketplace listing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanAddPlans</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can the current viewer add plans for this Marketplace listing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanApprove</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can the current viewer approve this Marketplace listing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanDelist</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can the current viewer delist this Marketplace listing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanEdit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can the current viewer edit this Marketplace listing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanEditCategories</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can the current viewer edit the primary and secondary category of this Marketplace listing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanEditPlans</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can the current viewer edit the plans for this Marketplace listing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanRedraft</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can the current viewer return this Marketplace listing to draft state so it becomes editable again.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanReject</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can the current viewer reject this Marketplace listing by returning it to an editable draft state or rejecting it entirely.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanRequestApproval</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can the current viewer request this listing be reviewed for display in the Marketplace as verified.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerHasPurchased</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Indicates whether the current user has an active subscription to this Marketplace listing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerHasPurchasedForAllOrganizations</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Indicates if the current user has purchased a subscription to this Marketplace listing for all of the organizations the user owns.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerIsListingAdmin</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Does the current viewer role allow them to administer this Marketplace listing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="marketplacelistingconnection" class="pt-3"> <a href="#marketplacelistingconnection">MarketplaceListingConnection</a> </h3>

           </tr> 
           <tr>

           </tr>

         </table>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="mentionedevent" class="pt-3"> <a href="#mentionedevent">MentionedEvent</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a<code>mentioned</code>event on a given issue or pull request.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="mergedevent" class="pt-3"> <a href="#mergedevent">MergedEvent</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a<code>merged</code>event on a given pull request.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#uniformresourcelocatable">UniformResourceLocatable</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#commit">Commit</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the commit associated with the <code>merge</code> event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>mergeRef</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#ref">Ref</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the Ref associated with the <code>merge</code> event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>mergeRefName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the name of the Ref associated with the <code>merge</code> event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pullRequest</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequest">PullRequest!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>PullRequest referenced by event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this merged event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this merged event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="milestone" class="pt-3"> <a href="#milestone">Milestone</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a Milestone object on a given repository.</p>

         <ul>

               <p></p>

               <p></p>

        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#auditentry">AuditEntry</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li>

          <thead>

            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>action</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td>

        </div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="organization" class="pt-3"> <a href="#organization">Organization</a> </h3> 
         <p>An account on GitHub, with one or more owners, that has repositories, members and teams.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#memberstatusable">MemberStatusable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#packageowner">PackageOwner</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#profileowner">ProfileOwner</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#projectowner">ProjectOwner</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#repositoryowner">RepositoryOwner</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#sponsorable">Sponsorable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#uniformresourcelocatable">UniformResourceLocatable</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>anyPinnableItems</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Determine if this repository owner has any items that can be pinned to their profile.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>type</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#pinnableitemtype">PinnableItemType</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Filter to only a particular kind of pinnable item.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>auditLog</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#organizationauditentryconnection">OrganizationAuditEntryConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Audit log entries of the organization.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#auditlogorder">AuditLogOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for the returned audit log entries.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>query</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The query string to filter audit entries.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>avatarUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A URL pointing to the organization's public avatar.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>size</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The size of the resulting square image.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>description</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The organization's public profile description.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>descriptionHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The organization's public profile description rendered to HTML.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>domains</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#verifiabledomainconnection">VerifiableDomainConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of domains owned by the organization.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>isApproved</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Filter by if the domain is approved.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>isVerified</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Filter by if the domain is verified.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#verifiabledomainorder">VerifiableDomainOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for verifiable domains returned.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td>

            <td><p><code>repositories</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repositoryconnection">RepositoryConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of repositories that the user owns.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>affiliations</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#repositoryaffiliation">[RepositoryAffiliation]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Array of viewer's affiliation options for repositories returned from the connection. For example, OWNER will include only repositories that the current viewer owns.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>isFork</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters repositories according to whether they are forks of another repository.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>isLocked</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters repositories according to whether they have been locked.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#repositoryorder">RepositoryOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for repositories returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>ownerAffiliations</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#repositoryaffiliation">[RepositoryAffiliation]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Array of owner's affiliation options for repositories returned from the connection. For example, OWNER will include only repositories that the organization or user being viewed owns.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>privacy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#repositoryprivacy">RepositoryPrivacy</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters repositories according to privacy.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Find Repository.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Name of Repository to find.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>requiresTwoFactorAuthentication</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>When true the organization requires all members, billing managers, and outside collaborators to enable two-factor authentication.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this organization.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>samlIdentityProvider</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#organizationidentityprovider">OrganizationIdentityProvider</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The Organization's SAML identity providers.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>sponsorsListing</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorslisting">SponsorsListing</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The GitHub Sponsors listing for this user or organization.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>sponsorshipForViewerAsSponsor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorship">Sponsorship</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The viewer's sponsorship of this entity.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>sponsorshipsAsMaintainer</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorshipconnection">SponsorshipConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>This object's sponsorships as the maintainer.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>includePrivate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Whether or not to include private sponsorships in the result set.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#sponsorshiporder">SponsorshipOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for sponsorships returned from this connection. If left blank, the sponsorships will be ordered based on relevancy to the viewer.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>sponsorshipsAsSponsor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorshipconnection">SponsorshipConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>This object's sponsorships as the sponsor.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p>

               <p></p>

               <p></p> 
              </div>

           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>team</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#team">Team</a></code>)</p></td>

              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>teams</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#teamconnection">TeamConnection!</a></code>)</p></td>

             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>ldapMapped</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If true, filters teams that are mapped to an LDAP Group (Enterprise only).</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#teamorder">TeamOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for teams returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>privacy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#teamprivacy">TeamPrivacy</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters teams according to privacy.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>query</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters teams with query on team name and team slug.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>role</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#teamrole">TeamRole</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters teams according to whether the viewer is an admin or member on team.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>rootTeamsOnly</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If true, restrict to only root teams.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>userLogins</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">[String!]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>User logins to filter by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>teamsResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path listing organization's teams.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>teamsUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>twitterUsername</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanChangePinnedItems</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanCreateProjects</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="organizationidentityprovider" class="pt-3"> <a href="#organizationidentityprovider">OrganizationIdentityProvider</a> </h3> 
         <p>An Identity Provider configured to provision SAML and SCIM identities for Organizations.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>digestMethod</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The digest algorithm used to sign SAML requests for the Identity Provider.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>externalIdentities</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#externalidentityconnection">ExternalIdentityConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>External Identities provisioned by this Identity Provider.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>idpCertificate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#x509certificate">X509Certificate</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The x509 certificate used by the Identity Provider to sign assertions and responses.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>issuer</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The Issuer Entity ID for the SAML Identity Provider.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>organization</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#organization">Organization</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Organization this Identity Provider belongs to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>signatureMethod</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The signature algorithm used to sign SAML requests for the Identity Provider.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>ssoUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The URL endpoint for the Identity Provider's SAML SSO.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>versions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#packageversionconnection">PackageVersionConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>list of versions for this package.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p>

               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#packageversionorder">PackageVersionOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering of the returned packages.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the total count of items in the connection.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>
