         <h3 id="packagefile" class="pt-3"> <a href="#packagefile">PackageFile</a> </h3> 
         <p>A file in a package version.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul>

          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>md5</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Name of the file.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>packageVersion</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#packageversion">PackageVersion</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The package version this file belongs to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>sha1</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>SHA1 hash of the file.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>sha256</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>SHA256 hash of the file.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>size</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Size of the file in bytes.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>URL to download the asset.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="packageversion" class="pt-3"> <a href="#packageversion">PackageVersion</a> </h3> 
         <p>Information about a specific package version.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>files</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#packagefileconnection">PackageFileConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>List of files associated with this package version.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#packagefileorder">PackageFileOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering of the returned package files.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>package</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#package">Package</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The package associated with this version.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>platform</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The platform this version was built for.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>preRelease</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not this version is a pre-release.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>readme</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The README of this package version.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>release</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#release">Release</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The release associated with this package version.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>statistics</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#packageversionstatistics">PackageVersionStatistics</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Statistics about package activity.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>summary</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The package version summary.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>version</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The version string.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="pinnedissue" class="pt-3"> <a href="#pinnedissue">PinnedIssue</a> </h3> 
         <p>A Pinned Issue is a issue pinned to a repository's index page.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>issue</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#issue">Issue!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The issue that was pinned.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pinnedBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The actor that pinned this issue.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository that this issue was pinned to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="profileitemshowcase" class="pt-3"> <a href="#profileitemshowcase">ProfileItemShowcase</a> </h3> 
         <p>A curatable list of repositories relating to a repository owner, which defaults to showing the most popular repositories they own.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>hasPinnedItems</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not the owner has pinned any repositories or gists.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>items</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pinnableitemconnection">PinnableItemConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repositories and gists in the showcase. If the profile owner has any pinned items, those will be returned. Otherwise, the profile owner's popular repositories will be returned.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="project" class="pt-3"> <a href="#project">Project</a> </h3> 
         <p>Projects manage issues, pull requests and notes within a project owner.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#closable">Closable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatable">Updatable</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>body</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The project's description body.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bodyHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#html">HTML!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The projects description body rendered to HTML.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>closed</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p><code>true</code> if the object is closed (definition of closed may depend on type).</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>closedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was closed.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>columns</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#projectcolumnconnection">ProjectColumnConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>List of columns in the project.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>creator</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The actor who originally created the project.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The project's name.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>number</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The project's number.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>owner</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#projectowner">ProjectOwner!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The project's owner. Currently limited to repositories, organizations, and users.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pendingCards</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#projectcardconnection">ProjectCardConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>List of pending cards in this project.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>archivedStates</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#projectcardarchivedstate">[ProjectCardArchivedState]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>A list of archived states to filter the cards by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>progress</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#projectprogress">ProjectProgress!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Project progress details.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this project.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>state</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#projectstate">ProjectState!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether the project is open or closed.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this project.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanUpdate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the current viewer can update this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="projectcard" class="pt-3"> <a href="#projectcard">ProjectCard</a> </h3> 
         <p>A card in a project.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>column</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#projectcolumn">ProjectColumn</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The project column this card is associated under. A card may only belong to one project column at a time. The column field will be null if the card is created in a pending state and has yet to be associated with a column. Once cards are associated with a column, they will not become pending in the future.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>content</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#projectcarditem">ProjectCardItem</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The card content item.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>creator</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The actor who created this card.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isArchived</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether the card is archived.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>note</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The card note.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>project</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#project">Project!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The project that contains this card.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this card.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>state</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#projectcardstate">ProjectCardState</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The state of ProjectCard.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this card.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

          </thead>

            <td><p><code>cards</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#projectcardconnection">ProjectCardConnection!</a></code>)</p></td>

             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5">

               <p></p> 
              </div>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p>

             </div> </td>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="publickey" class="pt-3"> <a href="#publickey">PublicKey</a> </h3> 
         <p>A user's public key.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>accessedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The last time this authorization was used to perform an action. Values will be null for keys not owned by the user.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the key was created. Keys created before March 5th, 2014 have inaccurate values. Values will be null for keys not owned by the user.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>fingerprint</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The fingerprint for this PublicKey.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isReadOnly</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this PublicKey is read-only or not. Values will be null for keys not owned by the user.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>key</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The public key string.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the key was updated. Keys created before March 5th, 2014 may have inaccurate values. Values will be null for keys not owned by the user.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="publickeyconnection" class="pt-3"> <a href="#publickeyconnection">PublicKeyConnection</a> </h3> 
         <p>The connection type for PublicKey.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>edges</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#publickeyedge">[PublicKeyEdge]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of edges.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>nodes</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#publickey">[PublicKey]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of nodes.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pageInfo</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pageinfo">PageInfo!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Information to aid in pagination.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the total count of items in the connection.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="publickeyedge" class="pt-3"> <a href="#publickeyedge">PublicKeyEdge</a> </h3> 
         <p>An edge in a connection.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>cursor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>node</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#publickey">PublicKey</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The item at the end of the edge.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="pullrequest" class="pt-3"> <a href="#pullrequest">PullRequest</a> </h3> 
         <p>A repository pull request.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#assignable">Assignable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#closable">Closable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#comment">Comment</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#labelable">Labelable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#lockable">Lockable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#reactable">Reactable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#repositorynode">RepositoryNode</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#subscribable">Subscribable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#uniformresourcelocatable">UniformResourceLocatable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatable">Updatable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatablecomment">UpdatableComment</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>activeLockReason</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#lockreason">LockReason</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Reason that the conversation was locked.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>additions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The number of additions in this pull request.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>assignees</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#userconnection">UserConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of Users assigned to this object.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>author</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The actor who authored the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>authorAssociation</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#commentauthorassociation">CommentAuthorAssociation!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Author's association with the subject of the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>autoMergeRequest</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#automergerequest">AutoMergeRequest</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Returns the auto-merge request object if one exists for this pull request.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>baseRef</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#ref">Ref</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the base Ref associated with the pull request.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>baseRefName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>baseRefOid</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#gitobjectid">GitObjectID!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>baseRepository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>body</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The body as Markdown.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bodyHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#html">HTML!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The body rendered to HTML.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bodyText</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The body rendered to text.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>canBeRebased</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not the pull request is rebaseable.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown note border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-info color-bg-info f5"> 
              <p><b>Preview notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>canBeRebased</code> is available under the <a href="/en/graphql/overview/schema-previews#merge-info-preview">Merge info preview</a>. During the preview period, the API may change without notice.</p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>changedFiles</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The number of changed files in this pull request.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>checksResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for the checks of this pull request.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>checksUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for the checks of this pull request.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>closed</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p><code>true</code> if the pull request is closed.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>closedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was closed.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>comments</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#issuecommentconnection">IssueCommentConnection!</a></code>)</p></td>

               <p></p>

               <p></p> 
              </div>

               <p></p>

               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for issue comments returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr>

             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5">

               <p></p>

               <p></p>

               <p></p>

               <p></p> 
              </div>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td>

            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdViaEmail</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>files</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequestchangedfileconnection">PullRequestChangedFileConnection</a></code>)</p></td>

               <p></p>

               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr>

            <td><p><code>headRef</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#ref">Ref</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

           </tr>

           </tr>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>headRepositoryOwner</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#repositoryowner">RepositoryOwner</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>hovercard</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#hovercard">Hovercard!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The hovercard information for this issue.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>includeNotificationContexts</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Whether or not to include notification contexts.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>true</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>includesCreatedEdit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if this comment was edited and includes an edit with the creation data.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isCrossRepository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The head and base repositories are different.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isDraft</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies if the pull request is a draft.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isReadByViewer</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Is this pull request read by the viewer.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>labels</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#labelconnection">LabelConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of labels associated with the object.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#labelorder">LabelOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for labels returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>lastEditedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The moment the editor made the last edit.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>latestOpinionatedReviews</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequestreviewconnection">PullRequestReviewConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of latest reviews per user associated with the pull request.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>writersOnly</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Only return reviews from user who have write access to the repository.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>latestReviews</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequestreviewconnection">PullRequestReviewConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of latest reviews per user associated with the pull request that are not also pending review.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>locked</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p><code>true</code> if the pull request is locked.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>maintainerCanModify</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>mergeCommit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#commit">Commit</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>mergeStateStatus</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#mergestatestatus">MergeStateStatus!</a></code>)</p></td>

              <p><b>Preview notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>mergeStateStatus</code> is available under the <a href="/en/graphql/overview/schema-previews#merge-info-preview">Merge info preview</a>. During the preview period, the API may change without notice.</p>

This field will not return a value if the pull request is merged, or if the test merge commit is still being generated. See the <code>mergeable</code> field for more details on the mergeability of the pull request.</p><p></p> </td>

             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5">

            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the state of the pull request.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>suggestedReviewers</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#suggestedreviewer">[SuggestedReviewer]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of reviewer suggestions based on commit history and past review comments.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>timeline</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequesttimelineconnection">PullRequestTimelineConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of events, comments, commits, etc. associated with the pull request.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown warning border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-danger color-bg-danger f5"> 
              <p><b>Deprecation notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>timeline</code> is deprecated. </p>
              <p><code>timeline</code> will be removed Use PullRequest.timelineItems instead. Removal on 2020-10-01 UTC.</p>
              <p></p> 
             </div> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>since</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Allows filtering timeline events by a <code>since</code> timestamp.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>timelineItems</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequesttimelineitemsconnection">PullRequestTimelineItemsConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of events, comments, commits, etc. associated with the pull request.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>itemTypes</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#pullrequesttimelineitemsitemtype">[PullRequestTimelineItemsItemType!]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Filter timeline items by type.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>since</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Filter timeline items by a <code>since</code> timestamp.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>skip</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Skips the first <em>n</em> elements in the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>title</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the pull request title.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this pull request.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>userContentEdits</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#usercontenteditconnection">UserContentEditConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of edits to this content.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanApplySuggestion</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not the viewer can apply suggestion.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanDeleteHeadRef</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the viewer can restore the deleted head ref.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanDisableAutoMerge</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not the viewer can disable auto-merge.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanEnableAutoMerge</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not the viewer can enable auto-merge.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanReact</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can user react to this subject.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanSubscribe</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the viewer is able to change their subscription status for the repository.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanUpdate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the current viewer can update this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCannotUpdateReasons</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#commentcannotupdatereason">[CommentCannotUpdateReason!]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Reasons why the current viewer can not update this comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerDidAuthor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Did the viewer author this comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerLatestReview</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequestreview">PullRequestReview</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The latest review given from the viewer.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerLatestReviewRequest</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#reviewrequest">ReviewRequest</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The person who has requested the viewer for review on this pull request.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerMergeBodyText</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The merge body text for the viewer and method.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>mergeType</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#pullrequestmergemethod">PullRequestMergeMethod</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The merge method for the message.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerMergeHeadlineText</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The merge headline text for the viewer and method.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5">

               <p>The merge method for the message.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerSubscription</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#subscriptionstate">SubscriptionState</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies if the viewer is watching, not watching, or ignoring the subscribable entity.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

               <p></p>

           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table>

           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="pullrequestcontributionsbyrepository" class="pt-3"> <a href="#pullrequestcontributionsbyrepository">PullRequestContributionsByRepository</a> </h3> 
         <p>This aggregates pull requests opened by a user within one repository.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>contributions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#createdpullrequestcontributionconnection">CreatedPullRequestContributionConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The pull request contributions.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#contributionorder">ContributionOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for contributions returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository in which the pull requests were opened.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="pullrequestedge" class="pt-3"> <a href="#pullrequestedge">PullRequestEdge</a> </h3> 
         <p>An edge in a connection.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4>

           </tr>

            <td><p><code>node</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequest">PullRequest</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="pullrequestreview" class="pt-3"> <a href="#pullrequestreview">PullRequestReview</a> </h3> 
         <p>A review object for a given pull request.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#comment">Comment</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#deletable">Deletable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#reactable">Reactable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#repositorynode">RepositoryNode</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatable">Updatable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatablecomment">UpdatableComment</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead>

           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>author</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>authorAssociation</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#commentauthorassociation">CommentAuthorAssociation!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>authorCanPushToRepository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td>

               <p></p>

               <p></p>
