       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="pullrequestreviewcomment" class="pt-3"> <a href="#pullrequestreviewcomment">PullRequestReviewComment</a> </h3> 
         <p>A review comment associated with a given repository pull request.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#comment">Comment</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#deletable">Deletable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#minimizable">Minimizable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#reactable">Reactable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#repositorynode">RepositoryNode</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatable">Updatable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatablecomment">UpdatableComment</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>author</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The actor who authored the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>authorAssociation</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#commentauthorassociation">CommentAuthorAssociation!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Author's association with the subject of the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>body</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The comment body of this review comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bodyHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#html">HTML!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The body rendered to HTML.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bodyText</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The comment body of this review comment rendered as plain text.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#commit">Commit</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the commit associated with the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies when the comment was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdViaEmail</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if this comment was created via an email reply.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>diffHunk</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The diff hunk to which the comment applies.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>draftedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies when the comment was created in a draft state.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>editor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The actor who edited the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>includesCreatedEdit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if this comment was edited and includes an edit with the creation data.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isMinimized</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Returns whether or not a comment has been minimized.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>lastEditedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The moment the editor made the last edit.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>minimizedReason</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Returns why the comment was minimized.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>originalCommit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#commit">Commit</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the original commit associated with the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>originalPosition</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The original line index in the diff to which the comment applies.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>outdated</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies when the comment body is outdated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>path</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The path to which the comment applies.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>position</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The line index in the diff to which the comment applies.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>publishedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies when the comment was published at.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pullRequest</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequest">PullRequest!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The pull request associated with this review comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pullRequestReview</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequestreview">PullRequestReview</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The pull request review associated with this review comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reactionGroups</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#reactiongroup">[ReactionGroup!]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of reactions grouped by content left on the subject.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reactions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#reactionconnection">ReactionConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of Reactions left on the Issue.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>content</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#reactioncontent">ReactionContent</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Allows filtering Reactions by emoji.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#reactionorder">ReactionOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Allows specifying the order in which reactions are returned.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>replyTo</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequestreviewcomment">PullRequestReviewComment</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The comment this is a reply to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository associated with this node.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path permalink for this review comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>state</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#pullrequestreviewcommentstate">PullRequestReviewCommentState!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the state of the comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies when the comment was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL permalink for this review comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>userContentEdits</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#usercontenteditconnection">UserContentEditConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of edits to this content.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanDelete</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the current viewer can delete this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanMinimize</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the current viewer can minimize this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanReact</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can user react to this subject.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanUpdate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the current viewer can update this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCannotUpdateReasons</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#commentcannotupdatereason">[CommentCannotUpdateReason!]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Reasons why the current viewer can not update this comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerDidAuthor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Did the viewer author this comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="pullrequestreviewthread" class="pt-3"> <a href="#pullrequestreviewthread">PullRequestReviewThread</a> </h3> 
         <p>A threaded list of comments for a given pull request.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>comments</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequestreviewcommentconnection">PullRequestReviewCommentConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of pull request comments associated with the thread.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>skip</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Skips the first <em>n</em> elements in the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>diffSide</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#diffside">DiffSide!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The side of the diff on which this thread was placed.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isCollapsed</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not the thread has been collapsed (outdated or resolved).</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isOutdated</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Indicates whether this thread was outdated by newer changes.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isResolved</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this thread has been resolved.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>line</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The line in the file to which this thread refers.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>originalLine</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The original line in the file to which this thread refers.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>originalStartLine</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The original start line in the file to which this thread refers (multi-line only).</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>path</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the file path of this thread.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pullRequest</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequest">PullRequest!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the pull request associated with this thread.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the repository associated with this thread.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resolvedBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user who resolved this thread.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>startDiffSide</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#diffside">DiffSide</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The side of the diff that the first line of the thread starts on (multi-line only).</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>startLine</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The start line in the file to which this thread refers (multi-line only).</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanReply</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Indicates whether the current viewer can reply to this thread.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanResolve</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not the viewer can resolve this thread.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanUnresolve</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not the viewer can unresolve this thread.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="ratelimit" class="pt-3"> <a href="#ratelimit">RateLimit</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents the client's rate limit.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>cost</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The point cost for the current query counting against the rate limit.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>limit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The maximum number of points the client is permitted to consume in a 60 minute window.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>nodeCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The maximum number of nodes this query may return.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>remaining</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The number of points remaining in the current rate limit window.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resetAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The time at which the current rate limit window resets in UTC epoch seconds.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>used</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The number of points used in the current rate limit window.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="reaction" class="pt-3"> <a href="#reaction">Reaction</a> </h3> 
         <p>An emoji reaction to a particular piece of content.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>content</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#reactioncontent">ReactionContent!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the emoji reaction.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reactable</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#reactable">Reactable!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The reactable piece of content.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>user</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the user who created this reaction.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="reactionconnection" class="pt-3"> <a href="#reactionconnection">ReactionConnection</a> </h3> 
         <p>A list of reactions that have been left on the subject.</p>

         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full">

           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th>

           </tr>

         </table>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="reactiongroup" class="pt-3"> <a href="#reactiongroup">ReactionGroup</a> </h3> 
         <p>A group of emoji reactions to a particular piece of content.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>content</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#reactioncontent">ReactionContent!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the emoji reaction.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies when the reaction was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>subject</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#reactable">Reactable!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The subject that was reacted to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>users</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#reactinguserconnection">ReactingUserConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Users who have reacted to the reaction subject with the emotion represented by this reaction group.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerHasReacted</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not the authenticated user has left a reaction on the subject.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="ref" class="pt-3"> <a href="#ref">Ref</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a Git reference.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>associatedPullRequests</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequestconnection">PullRequestConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of pull requests with this ref as the head ref.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>baseRefName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The base ref name to filter the pull requests by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>headRefName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The head ref name to filter the pull requests by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>labels</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">[String!]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>A list of label names to filter the pull requests by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#issueorder">IssueOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for pull requests returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>states</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#pullrequeststate">[PullRequestState!]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>A list of states to filter the pull requests by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>branchProtectionRule</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#branchprotectionrule">BranchProtectionRule</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Branch protection rules for this ref.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The ref name.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>prefix</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The ref's prefix, such as <code>refs/heads/</code> or <code>refs/tags/</code>.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>refUpdateRule</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#refupdaterule">RefUpdateRule</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Branch protection rules that are viewable by non-admins.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository the ref belongs to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>target</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#gitobject">GitObject</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The object the ref points to. Returns null when object does not exist.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="refupdaterule" class="pt-3"> <a href="#refupdaterule">RefUpdateRule</a> </h3> 
         <p>A ref update rules for a viewer.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>allowsDeletions</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can this branch be deleted.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>allowsForcePushes</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Are force pushes allowed on this branch.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pattern</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the protection rule pattern.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>requiredApprovingReviewCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Number of approving reviews required to update matching branches.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>requiredStatusCheckContexts</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">[String]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>List of required status check contexts that must pass for commits to be accepted to matching branches.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>requiresCodeOwnerReviews</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Are reviews from code owners required to update matching branches.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>requiresLinearHistory</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Are merge commits prohibited from being pushed to this branch.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>requiresSignatures</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Are commits required to be signed.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerAllowedToDismissReviews</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Is the viewer allowed to dismiss reviews.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanPush</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can the viewer push to the branch.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="referencedevent" class="pt-3"> <a href="#referencedevent">ReferencedEvent</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a<code>referenced</code>event on a given <code>ReferencedSubject</code>.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#commit">Commit</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the commit associated with the<code>referenced</code>event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commitRepository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the repository associated with the<code>referenced</code>event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isCrossRepository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Reference originated in a different repository.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isDirectReference</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Checks if the commit message itself references the subject. Can be false in the case of a commit comment reference.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>subject</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#referencedsubject">ReferencedSubject!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Object referenced by event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="release" class="pt-3"> <a href="#release">Release</a> </h3> 
         <p>A release contains the content for a release.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#uniformresourcelocatable">UniformResourceLocatable</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>author</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The author of the release.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>description</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The description of the release.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>descriptionHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#html">HTML</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The description of this release rendered to HTML.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isDraft</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not the release is a draft.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isLatest</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not the release is the latest releast.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isPrerelease</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not the release is a prerelease.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The title of the release.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>publishedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the release was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>releaseAssets</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#releaseassetconnection">ReleaseAssetConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>List of releases assets which are dependent on this release.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>A list of names to filter the assets by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository that the release belongs to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this issue.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>shortDescriptionHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#html">HTML</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A description of the release, rendered to HTML without any links in it.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>limit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>How many characters to return.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>200</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>tag</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#ref">Ref</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The Git tag the release points to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>tagCommit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#commit">Commit</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The tag commit for this release.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>tagName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The name of the release's Git tag.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this issue.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="releaseasset" class="pt-3"> <a href="#releaseasset">ReleaseAsset</a> </h3> 
         <p>A release asset contains the content for a release asset.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>contentType</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The asset's content-type.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>downloadCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The number of times this asset was downloaded.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>downloadUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the URL where you can download the release asset via the browser.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the title of the release asset.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>release</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#release">Release</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Release that the asset is associated with.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>size</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The size (in bytes) of the asset.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>uploadedBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user that performed the upload.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the URL of the release asset.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

         <h3 id="removedfromprojectevent" class="pt-3"> <a href="#removedfromprojectevent">RemovedFromProjectEvent</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a<code>removed_from_project</code>event on a given issue or pull request.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>project</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#project">Project</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Project referenced by event.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown note border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-info color-bg-info f5"> 
              <p><b>Preview notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>project</code> is available under the <a href="/en/graphql/overview/schema-previews#project-event-details-preview">Project event details preview</a>. During the preview period, the API may change without notice.</p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>projectColumnName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Column name referenced by this project event.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown note border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-info color-bg-info f5"> 
              <p><b>Preview notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>projectColumnName</code> is available under the <a href="/en/graphql/overview/schema-previews#project-event-details-preview">Project event details preview</a>. During the preview period, the API may change without notice.</p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="repoaccessauditentry" class="pt-3"> <a href="#repoaccessauditentry">RepoAccessAuditEntry</a> </h3> 
         <p>Audit log entry for a repo.access event.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#auditentry">AuditEntry</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#organizationauditentrydata">OrganizationAuditEntryData</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#repositoryauditentrydata">RepositoryAuditEntryData</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>action</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The action name.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#auditentryactor">AuditEntryActor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user who initiated the action.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actorIp</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The IP address of the actor.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actorLocation</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#actorlocation">ActorLocation</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A readable representation of the actor's location.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actorLogin</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The username of the user who initiated the action.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actorResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for the actor.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actorUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td>

         <h3 id="repocreateauditentry" class="pt-3"> <a href="#repocreateauditentry">RepoCreateAuditEntry</a> </h3> 
         <p>Audit log entry for a repo.create event.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#auditentry">AuditEntry</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>organizationResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for the organization.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>organizationUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for the organization.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository associated with the action.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repositoryName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The name of the repository.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repositoryResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for the repository.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repositoryUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for the repository.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>topic</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#topic">Topic</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The name of the topic added to the repository.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>topicName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The name of the topic added to the repository.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>user</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user affected by the action.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>userLogin</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>For actions involving two users, the actor is the initiator and the user is the affected user.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>userResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for the user.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>userUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for the user.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="repository" class="pt-3"> <a href="#repository">Repository</a> </h3> 
         <p>A repository contains the content for a project.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#packageowner">PackageOwner</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#projectowner">ProjectOwner</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#repositoryinfo">RepositoryInfo</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#starrable">Starrable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#subscribable">Subscribable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#uniformresourcelocatable">UniformResourceLocatable</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>assignableUsers</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#userconnection">UserConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of users that can be assigned to issues in this repository.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>query</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Filters users with query on user name and login.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div>

           </tr>

            <td><p><code>diskUsage</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The number of kilobytes this repository occupies on disk.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>forkCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Returns how many forks there are of this repository in the whole network.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>forks</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repositoryconnection">RepositoryConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of direct forked repositories.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>affiliations</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#repositoryaffiliation">[RepositoryAffiliation]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Array of viewer's affiliation options for repositories returned from the connection. For example, OWNER will include only repositories that the current viewer owns.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>isLocked</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters repositories according to whether they have been locked.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#repositoryorder">RepositoryOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for repositories returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>ownerAffiliations</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#repositoryaffiliation">[RepositoryAffiliation]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Array of owner's affiliation options for repositories returned from the connection. For example, OWNER will include only repositories that the organization or user being viewed owns.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>privacy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#repositoryprivacy">RepositoryPrivacy</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters repositories according to privacy.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>fundingLinks</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#fundinglink">[FundingLink!]!</a></code>)</p></td>

           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>issues</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#issueconnection">IssueConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of issues that have been opened in the repository.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>filterBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#issuefilters">IssueFilters</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Filtering options for issues returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>labels</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">[String!]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>A list of label names to filter the pull requests by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#issueorder">IssueOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for issues returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>states</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#issuestate">[IssueState!]</a></code>)</p>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr>

              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>names</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">[String]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Find packages by their names.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#packageorder">PackageOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering of the returned packages.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>packageType</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#packagetype">PackageType</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Filter registry package by type.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>repositoryId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#id">ID</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Find packages in a repository by ID.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>parent</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository parent, if this is a fork.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr>

            <td><p><code>ref</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#ref">Ref</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Fetch a given ref from the repository.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>qualifiedName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The ref to retrieve. Fully qualified matches are checked in order (<code>refs/heads/master</code>) before falling back onto checks for short name matches (<code>master</code>).</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>refs</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#refconnection">RefConnection</a></code>)</p></td>

               <p>Order for connection.</p>
               <p></p>

             </div> </td>
