           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>submodules</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#submoduleconnection">SubmoduleConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Returns a list of all submodules in this repository parsed from the .gitmodules file as of the default branch's HEAD commit.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>tempCloneToken</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Temporary authentication token for cloning this repository.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>templateRepository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The repository from which this repository was generated, if any.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this repository.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>usesCustomOpenGraphImage</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this repository has a custom image to use with Open Graph as opposed to being represented by the owner's avatar.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanAdminister</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Indicates whether the viewer has admin permissions on this repository.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanCreateProjects</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Can the current viewer create new projects on this owner.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanSubscribe</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the viewer is able to change their subscription status for the repository.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanUpdateTopics</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Indicates whether the viewer can update the topics of this repository.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerDefaultCommitEmail</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The last commit email for the viewer.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerDefaultMergeMethod</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#pullrequestmergemethod">PullRequestMergeMethod!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The last used merge method by the viewer or the default for the repository.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerHasStarred</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Returns a boolean indicating whether the viewing user has starred this starrable.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerPermission</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#repositorypermission">RepositoryPermission</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The users permission level on the repository. Will return null if authenticated as an GitHub App.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerPossibleCommitEmails</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">[String!]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of emails this viewer can commit with.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerSubscription</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#subscriptionstate">SubscriptionState</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies if the viewer is watching, not watching, or ignoring the subscribable entity.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>vulnerabilityAlerts</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repositoryvulnerabilityalertconnection">RepositoryVulnerabilityAlertConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of vulnerability alerts that are on this repository.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>watchers</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#userconnection">UserConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of users watching the repository.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

            <th>Description</th>

          </thead>

            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the total count of items in the connection.</p><p></p> </td>

           </tr>

            <td><p></p><p>Whether this contribution is associated with a record you do not have access to. For example, your own 'first issue' contribution may have been made on a repository you can no longer access.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>occurredAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

         <h3 id="reviewdismissalallowance" class="pt-3"> <a href="#reviewdismissalallowance">ReviewDismissalAllowance</a> </h3>

        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li>

           </tr>

         <h3 id="reviewdismissedevent" class="pt-3"> <a href="#reviewdismissedevent">ReviewDismissedEvent</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a<code>review_dismissed</code>event on a given issue or pull request.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#uniformresourcelocatable">UniformResourceLocatable</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>dismissalMessage</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the optional message associated with the<code>review_dismissed</code>event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>dismissalMessageHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the optional message associated with the event, rendered to HTML.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>previousReviewState</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#pullrequestreviewstate">PullRequestReviewState!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the previous state of the review with the<code>review_dismissed</code>event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pullRequest</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequest">PullRequest!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>PullRequest referenced by event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pullRequestCommit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequestcommit">PullRequestCommit</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the commit which caused the review to become stale.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this review dismissed event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>review</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pullrequestreview">PullRequestReview</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the review associated with the<code>review_dismissed</code>event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>url</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this review dismissed event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

         <h3 id="searchresultitemedge" class="pt-3"> <a href="#searchresultitemedge">SearchResultItemEdge</a> </h3>

        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4>

          <thead>

            <th>Name</th>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>textMatches</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#textmatch">[TextMatch]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Text matches on the result found.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="securityadvisory" class="pt-3"> <a href="#securityadvisory">SecurityAdvisory</a> </h3> 
         <p>A GitHub Security Advisory.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr>

            <th>Description</th>

           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>cvss</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#cvss">CVSS!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The CVSS associated with this advisory.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>cwes</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#cweconnection">CWEConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>CWEs associated with this Advisory.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr>

            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

            <td><p><code>description</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

            <td><p><code>ghsaId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td>

            <td><p></p><p>A list of identifiers for this advisory.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>notificationsPermalink</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

           </tr> 
           <tr>

           </tr> 
           <tr>

           </tr> 
           <tr>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>When the advisory was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>vulnerabilities</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#securityvulnerabilityconnection">SecurityVulnerabilityConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Vulnerabilities associated with this Advisory.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>ecosystem</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#securityadvisoryecosystem">SecurityAdvisoryEcosystem</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>An ecosystem to filter vulnerabilities by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#securityvulnerabilityorder">SecurityVulnerabilityOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for the returned topics.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p>A package name to filter vulnerabilities by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>severities</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#securityadvisoryseverity">[SecurityAdvisorySeverity!]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>A list of severities to filter vulnerabilities by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>withdrawnAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>When the advisory was withdrawn, if it has been withdrawn.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="securityvulnerability" class="pt-3"> <a href="#securityvulnerability">SecurityVulnerability</a> </h3> 
         <p>An individual vulnerability within an Advisory.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>advisory</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#securityadvisory">SecurityAdvisory!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The Advisory associated with this Vulnerability.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>firstPatchedVersion</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#securityadvisorypackageversion">SecurityAdvisoryPackageVersion</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The first version containing a fix for the vulnerability.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>package</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#securityadvisorypackage">SecurityAdvisoryPackage!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A description of the vulnerable package.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>severity</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#securityadvisoryseverity">SecurityAdvisorySeverity!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The severity of the vulnerability within this package.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>When the vulnerability was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>vulnerableVersionRange</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A string that describes the vulnerable package versions. This string follows a basic syntax with a few forms.</p> 
             <ul> 
              <li><code>= 0.2.0</code> denotes a single vulnerable version.</li> 
              <li><code>&lt;= 1.0.8</code> denotes a version range up to and including the specified version</li> 
              <li><code>&lt; 0.1.11</code> denotes a version range up to, but excluding, the specified version</li> 
              <li><code>&gt;= 4.3.0, &lt; 4.3.5</code> denotes a version range with a known minimum and maximum version.</li> 
              <li><code>&gt;= 0.0.1</code> denotes a version range with a known minimum, but no known maximum.</li> 
             </ul><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="smimesignature" class="pt-3"> <a href="#smimesignature">SmimeSignature</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents an S/MIME signature on a Commit or Tag.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#gitsignature">GitSignature</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>email</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Email used to sign this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isValid</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>True if the signature is valid and verified by GitHub.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>payload</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Payload for GPG signing object. Raw ODB object without the signature header.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>signature</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>ASCII-armored signature header from object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>signer</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>GitHub user corresponding to the email signing this commit.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>state</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#gitsignaturestate">GitSignatureState!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The state of this signature. <code>VALID</code> if signature is valid and verified by GitHub, otherwise represents reason why signature is considered invalid.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>wasSignedByGitHub</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>True if the signature was made with GitHub's signing key.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="sponsorableitemconnection" class="pt-3"> <a href="#sponsorableitemconnection">SponsorableItemConnection</a> </h3> 
         <p>The connection type for SponsorableItem.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>edges</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorableitemedge">[SponsorableItemEdge]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of edges.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>nodes</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#sponsorableitem">[SponsorableItem]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of nodes.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pageInfo</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pageinfo">PageInfo!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Information to aid in pagination.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>totalCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the total count of items in the connection.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="sponsorsgoal" class="pt-3"> <a href="#sponsorsgoal">SponsorsGoal</a> </h3> 
         <p>A goal associated with a GitHub Sponsors listing, representing a target the sponsored maintainer would like to attain.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>description</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A description of the goal from the maintainer.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>kind</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#sponsorsgoalkind">SponsorsGoalKind!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>What the objective of this goal is.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>percentComplete</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The percentage representing how complete this goal is, between 0-100.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>targetValue</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>What the goal amount is. Represents a dollar amount for monthly sponsorship amount goals. Represents a count of unique sponsors for total sponsors count goals.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>title</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A brief summary of the kind and target value of this goal.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="sponsorslisting" class="pt-3"> <a href="#sponsorslisting">SponsorsListing</a> </h3> 
         <p>A GitHub Sponsors listing.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>activeGoal</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorsgoal">SponsorsGoal</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The current goal the maintainer is trying to reach with GitHub Sponsors, if any.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>fullDescription</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The full description of the listing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>fullDescriptionHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#html">HTML!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The full description of the listing rendered to HTML.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The listing's full name.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>shortDescription</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The short description of the listing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>slug</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The short name of the listing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>tiers</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorstierconnection">SponsorsTierConnection</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The published tiers for this GitHub Sponsors listing.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#sponsorstierorder">SponsorsTierOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for Sponsors tiers returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="sponsorstier" class="pt-3"> <a href="#sponsorstier">SponsorsTier</a> </h3> 
         <p>A GitHub Sponsors tier associated with a GitHub Sponsors listing.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>adminInfo</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorstieradmininfo">SponsorsTierAdminInfo</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>SponsorsTier information only visible to users that can administer the associated Sponsors listing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>closestLesserValueTier</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorstier">SponsorsTier</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Get a different tier for this tier's maintainer that is at the same frequency as this tier but with a lesser cost. Returns the published tier with the monthly price closest to this tier's without going over.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>description</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The description of the tier.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>descriptionHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#html">HTML!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The tier description rendered to HTML.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isCustomAmount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this tier was chosen at checkout time by the sponsor rather than defined ahead of time by the maintainer who manages the Sponsors listing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isOneTime</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this tier is only for use with one-time sponsorships.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>monthlyPriceInCents</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How much this tier costs per month in cents.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>monthlyPriceInDollars</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How much this tier costs per month in dollars.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The name of the tier.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>sponsorsListing</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorslisting">SponsorsListing!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The sponsors listing that this tier belongs to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="sponsorstieradmininfo" class="pt-3"> <a href="#sponsorstieradmininfo">SponsorsTierAdminInfo</a> </h3> 
         <p>SponsorsTier information only visible to users that can administer the associated Sponsors listing.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>sponsorships</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorshipconnection">SponsorshipConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The sponsorships associated with this tier.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>includePrivate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Whether or not to include private sponsorships in the result set.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#sponsorshiporder">SponsorshipOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for sponsorships returned from this connection. If left blank, the sponsorships will be ordered based on relevancy to the viewer.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="sponsorship" class="pt-3"> <a href="#sponsorship">Sponsorship</a> </h3> 
         <p>A sponsorship relationship between a sponsor and a maintainer.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isOneTimePayment</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this sponsorship represents a one-time payment versus a recurring sponsorship.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>maintainer</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The entity that is being sponsored.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown warning border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-danger color-bg-danger f5"> 
              <p><b>Deprecation notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>maintainer</code> is deprecated. </p>
              <p><code>Sponsorship.maintainer</code> will be removed. Use <code>Sponsorship.sponsorable</code> instead. Removal on 2020-04-01 UTC.</p>
              <p></p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>privacyLevel</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#sponsorshipprivacy">SponsorshipPrivacy!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The privacy level for this sponsorship.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>sponsor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user that is sponsoring. Returns null if the sponsorship is private or if sponsor is not a user.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown warning border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-danger color-bg-danger f5"> 
              <p><b>Deprecation notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>sponsor</code> is deprecated. </p>
              <p><code>Sponsorship.sponsor</code> will be removed. Use <code>Sponsorship.sponsorEntity</code> instead. Removal on 2020-10-01 UTC.</p>
              <p></p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>sponsorEntity</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#sponsor">Sponsor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user or organization that is sponsoring, if you have permission to view them.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>sponsorable</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#sponsorable">Sponsorable!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The entity that is being sponsored.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>tier</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorstier">SponsorsTier</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The associated sponsorship tier.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>tierSelectedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the current tier was chosen for this sponsorship.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="sponsorshipedge" class="pt-3"> <a href="#sponsorshipedge">SponsorshipEdge</a> </h3> 
         <p>An edge in a connection.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>cursor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>node</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorship">Sponsorship</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The item at the end of the edge.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="status" class="pt-3"> <a href="#status">Status</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a commit status.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>combinedContexts</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#statuscheckrollupcontextconnection">StatusCheckRollupContextConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of status contexts and check runs for this commit.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#commit">Commit</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The commit this status is attached to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>context</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#statuscontext">StatusContext</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Looks up an individual status context by context name.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The context name.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>contexts</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#statuscontext">[StatusContext!]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The individual status contexts for this commit.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>state</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#statusstate">StatusState!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The combined commit status.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div>

         <h3 id="statuscheckrollup" class="pt-3"> <a href="#statuscheckrollup">StatusCheckRollup</a> </h3>

        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>contexts</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#statuscheckrollupcontextconnection">StatusCheckRollupContextConnection!</a></code>)</p></td>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="statuscontext" class="pt-3"> <a href="#statuscontext">StatusContext</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents an individual commit status context.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#requirablebypullrequest">RequirableByPullRequest</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>avatarUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The avatar of the OAuth application or the user that created the status.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>size</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The size of the resulting square image.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>40</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commit</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#commit">Commit</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>This commit this status context is attached to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>context</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The name of this status context.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>creator</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The actor who created this status context.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>description</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The description for this status context.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isRequired</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this is required to pass before merging for a specific pull request.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>pullRequestId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#id">ID</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The id of the pull request this is required for.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>pullRequestNumber</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The number of the pull request this is required for.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>state</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#statusstate">StatusState!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The state of this status context.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>targetUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The URL for this status context.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="submodule" class="pt-3"> <a href="#submodule">Submodule</a> </h3> 
         <p>A pointer to a repository at a specific revision embedded inside another repository.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>branch</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The branch of the upstream submodule for tracking updates.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>gitUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The git URL of the submodule repository.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The name of the submodule in .gitmodules.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>path</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The path in the superproject that this submodule is located in.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>subprojectCommitOid</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#gitobjectid">GitObjectID</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The commit revision of the subproject repository being tracked by the submodule.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="submoduleedge" class="pt-3"> <a href="#submoduleedge">SubmoduleEdge</a> </h3> 
         <p>An edge in a connection.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>cursor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>node</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#submodule">Submodule</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The item at the end of the edge.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="subscribedevent" class="pt-3"> <a href="#subscribedevent">SubscribedEvent</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a<code>subscribed</code>event on a given <code>Subscribable</code>.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>subscribable</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#subscribable">Subscribable!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Object referenced by event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="suggestedreviewer" class="pt-3"> <a href="#suggestedreviewer">SuggestedReviewer</a> </h3> 
         <p>A suggestion to review a pull request based on a user's commit history and review comments.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isAuthor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Is this suggestion based on past commits?.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isCommenter</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Is this suggestion based on past review comments?.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reviewer</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the user suggested to review the pull request.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="tag" class="pt-3"> <a href="#tag">Tag</a> </h3>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commitResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td>

           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>message</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

            <td><p><code>target</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#gitobject">GitObject!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="team" class="pt-3"> <a href="#team">Team</a> </h3> 
         <p>A team of users in an organization.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#memberstatusable">MemberStatusable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#subscribable">Subscribable</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>ancestors</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#teamconnection">TeamConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of teams that are ancestors of this team.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p> 
              </div>

               <p></p>

               <p></p> 
              </div>

               <p></p>

               <p></p>

               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>ALL</code>.</p>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p>
               <p>Filter by team member role.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>membersResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for the team' members.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>membersUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for the team' members.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The name of the team.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>newTeamResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path creating a new team.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>newTeamUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL creating a new team.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>organization</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#organization">Organization!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The organization that owns this team.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>parentTeam</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#team">Team</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The parent team of the team.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>privacy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#teamprivacy">TeamPrivacy!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The level of privacy the team has.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repositories</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#teamrepositoryconnection">TeamRepositoryConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of repositories this team has access to.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#teamrepositoryorder">TeamRepositoryOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Order for the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>query</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The search string to look for.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repositoriesResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this team's repositories.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repositoriesUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this team's repositories.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>resourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this team.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reviewRequestDelegationAlgorithm</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#teamreviewassignmentalgorithm">TeamReviewAssignmentAlgorithm</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>What algorithm is used for review assignment for this team.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown note border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-info color-bg-info f5"> 
              <p><b>Preview notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>reviewRequestDelegationAlgorithm</code> is available under the <a href="/en/graphql/overview/schema-previews#team-review-assignments-preview">Team review assignments preview</a>. During the preview period, the API may change without notice.</p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reviewRequestDelegationEnabled</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>True if review assignment is enabled for this team.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown note border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-info color-bg-info f5"> 
              <p><b>Preview notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>reviewRequestDelegationEnabled</code> is available under the <a href="/en/graphql/overview/schema-previews#team-review-assignments-preview">Team review assignments preview</a>. During the preview period, the API may change without notice.</p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reviewRequestDelegationMemberCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>How many team members are required for review assignment for this team.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown note border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-info color-bg-info f5">

              <p><code>reviewRequestDelegationMemberCount</code> is available under the <a href="/en/graphql/overview/schema-previews#team-review-assignments-preview">Team review assignments preview</a>. During the preview period, the API may change without notice.</p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>reviewRequestDelegationNotifyTeam</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>When assigning team members via delegation, whether the entire team should be notified as well.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown note border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-info color-bg-info f5"> 
              <p><b>Preview notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>reviewRequestDelegationNotifyTeam</code> is available under the <a href="/en/graphql/overview/schema-previews#team-review-assignments-preview">Team review assignments preview</a>. During the preview period, the API may change without notice.</p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>slug</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The slug corresponding to the team.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>teamsResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

           </tr> 
           <tr>

         <h3 id="teamchangeparentteamauditentry" class="pt-3"> <a href="#teamchangeparentteamauditentry">TeamChangeParentTeamAuditEntry</a> </h3> 
         <p>Audit log entry for a team.change_parent_team event.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#auditentry">AuditEntry</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#organizationauditentrydata">OrganizationAuditEntryData</a></code></li>

         </ul>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="teamdiscussion" class="pt-3"> <a href="#teamdiscussion">TeamDiscussion</a> </h3> 
         <p>A team discussion.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#comment">Comment</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#deletable">Deletable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#reactable">Reactable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#subscribable">Subscribable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#uniformresourcelocatable">UniformResourceLocatable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatable">Updatable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#updatablecomment">UpdatableComment</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>author</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>authorAssociation</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#commentauthorassociation">CommentAuthorAssociation!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>body</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The body as Markdown.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bodyHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#html">HTML!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bodyText</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bodyVersion</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>comments</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#teamdiscussioncommentconnection">TeamDiscussionCommentConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of comments on this discussion.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>fromComment</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>When provided, filters the connection such that results begin with the comment with this number.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#teamdiscussioncommentorder">TeamDiscussionCommentOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Order for connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commentsResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td>

               <p></p>

               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div>

               <p></p>

           </tr>

            <td><p><code>viewerCanReact</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanSubscribe</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the viewer is able to change their subscription status for the repository.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanUpdate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Check if the current viewer can update this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCannotUpdateReasons</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#commentcannotupdatereason">[CommentCannotUpdateReason!]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Reasons why the current viewer can not update this comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerDidAuthor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Did the viewer author this comment.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerSubscription</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#subscriptionstate">SubscriptionState</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies if the viewer is watching, not watching, or ignoring the subscribable entity.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="teamdiscussioncomment" class="pt-3"> <a href="#teamdiscussioncomment">TeamDiscussionComment</a> </h3>

               <p></p> 
              </div>
