               <p></p> 
              </div>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p>

               <p></p> 
              </div>

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="teamremovememberauditentry" class="pt-3"> <a href="#teamremovememberauditentry">TeamRemoveMemberAuditEntry</a> </h3> 
         <p>Audit log entry for a team.remove_member event.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#auditentry">AuditEntry</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#organizationauditentrydata">OrganizationAuditEntryData</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#teamauditentrydata">TeamAuditEntryData</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>action</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The action name.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#auditentryactor">AuditEntryActor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user who initiated the action.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actorIp</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The IP address of the actor.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actorLocation</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#actorlocation">ActorLocation</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A readable representation of the actor's location.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actorLogin</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The username of the user who initiated the action.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actorResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for the actor.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actorUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for the actor.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#precisedatetime">PreciseDateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The time the action was initiated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isLdapMapped</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether the team was mapped to an LDAP Group.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>operationType</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#operationtype">OperationType</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The corresponding operation type for the action.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>organization</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#organization">Organization</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="topic" class="pt-3"> <a href="#topic">Topic</a> </h3> 
         <p>A topic aggregates entities that are related to a subject.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#starrable">Starrable</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The topic's name.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>relatedTopics</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#topic">[Topic!]!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of related topics, including aliases of this topic, sorted with the most relevant first. Returns up to 10 Topics.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>How many topics to return.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>3</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>stargazerCount</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Returns a count of how many stargazers there are on this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>stargazers</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#stargazerconnection">StargazerConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of users who have starred this starrable.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#starorder">StarOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Order for connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerHasStarred</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Returns a boolean indicating whether the viewing user has starred this starrable.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="transferredevent" class="pt-3"> <a href="#transferredevent">TransferredEvent</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a<code>transferred</code>event on a given issue or pull request.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="tree" class="pt-3"> <a href="#tree">Tree</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a Git tree.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#gitobject">GitObject</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>abbreviatedOid</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>An abbreviated version of the Git object ID.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commitResourcePath</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP path for this Git object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commitUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The HTTP URL for this Git object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>entries</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#treeentry">[TreeEntry!]</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of tree entries.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>oid</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#gitobjectid">GitObjectID!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The Git object ID.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The Repository the Git object belongs to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="treeentry" class="pt-3"> <a href="#treeentry">TreeEntry</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents a Git tree entry.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>extension</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The extension of the file.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isGenerated</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not this tree entry is generated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>mode</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Entry file mode.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>name</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Entry file name.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>object</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#gitobject">GitObject</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Entry file object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>oid</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#gitobjectid">GitObjectID!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Entry file Git object ID.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>path</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The full path of the file.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The Repository the tree entry belongs to.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>submodule</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#submodule">Submodule</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>If the TreeEntry is for a directory occupied by a submodule project, this returns the corresponding submodule.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>type</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Entry file type.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="unassignedevent" class="pt-3"> <a href="#unassignedevent">UnassignedEvent</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents an<code>unassigned</code>event on any assignable object.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>actor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the actor who performed the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>assignable</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#assignable">Assignable!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the assignable associated with the event.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>assignee</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#assignee">Assignee</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the user or mannequin that was unassigned.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>user</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the subject (user) who was unassigned.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="extended-markdown warning border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-4 p-3 color-border-danger color-bg-danger f5"> 
              <p><b>Deprecation notice</b></p> 
              <p><code>user</code> is deprecated. </p>
              <p>Assignees can now be mannequins. Use the <code>assignee</code> field instead. Removal on 2020-01-01 UTC.</p>
              <p></p> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="unknownsignature" class="pt-3"> <a href="#unknownsignature">UnknownSignature</a> </h3> 
         <p>Represents an unknown signature on a Commit or Tag.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#gitsignature">GitSignature</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>email</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Email used to sign this object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isValid</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>True if the signature is valid and verified by GitHub.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>payload</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Payload for GPG signing object. Raw ODB object without the signature header.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>signature</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>ASCII-armored signature header from object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>signer</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>GitHub user corresponding to the email signing this commit.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>state</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#gitsignaturestate">GitSignatureState!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The state of this signature. <code>VALID</code> if signature is valid and verified by GitHub, otherwise represents reason why signature is considered invalid.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>wasSignedByGitHub</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>True if the signature was made with GitHub's signing key.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="user" class="pt-3"> <a href="#user">User</a> </h3> 
         <p>A user is an individual's account on GitHub that owns repositories and can make new content.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#actor">Actor</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#packageowner">PackageOwner</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#profileowner">ProfileOwner</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#projectowner">ProjectOwner</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#repositoryowner">RepositoryOwner</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#sponsorable">Sponsorable</a></code></li> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#uniformresourcelocatable">UniformResourceLocatable</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>anyPinnableItems</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Determine if this repository owner has any items that can be pinned to their profile.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>type</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#pinnableitemtype">PinnableItemType</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Filter to only a particular kind of pinnable item.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>avatarUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A URL pointing to the user's public avatar.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>size</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The size of the resulting square image.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bio</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user's public profile bio.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>bioHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#html">HTML!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user's public profile bio as HTML.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>canReceiveOrganizationEmailsWhenNotificationsRestricted</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Could this user receive email notifications, if the organization had notification restrictions enabled?.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>login</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The login of the organization to check.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>commitComments</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#commitcommentconnection">CommitCommentConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of commit comments made by this user.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>company</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user's public profile company.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>companyHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#html">HTML!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user's public profile company as HTML.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>contributionsCollection</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#contributionscollection">ContributionsCollection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The collection of contributions this user has made to different repositories.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>from</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Only contributions made at this time or later will be counted. If omitted, defaults to a year ago.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>organizationID</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#id">ID</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The ID of the organization used to filter contributions.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>to</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Only contributions made before and up to and including this time will be counted. If omitted, defaults to the current time.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td>

           </tr>

               <p></p>

              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>names</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">[String]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Find packages by their names.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#packageorder">PackageOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering of the returned packages.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>packageType</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#packagetype">PackageType</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Filter registry package by type.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>repositoryId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#id">ID</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Find packages in a repository by ID.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>pinnableItems</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#pinnableitemconnection">PinnableItemConnection!</a></code>)</p></td>

           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repositories</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repositoryconnection">RepositoryConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of repositories that the user owns.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>affiliations</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#repositoryaffiliation">[RepositoryAffiliation]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Array of viewer's affiliation options for repositories returned from the connection. For example, OWNER will include only repositories that the current viewer owns.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>isFork</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters repositories according to whether they are forks of another repository.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>isLocked</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters repositories according to whether they have been locked.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#repositoryorder">RepositoryOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for repositories returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>ownerAffiliations</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#repositoryaffiliation">[RepositoryAffiliation]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Array of owner's affiliation options for repositories returned from the connection. For example, OWNER will include only repositories that the organization or user being viewed owns.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>privacy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#repositoryprivacy">RepositoryPrivacy</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters repositories according to privacy.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repositoriesContributedTo</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repositoryconnection">RepositoryConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of repositories that the user recently contributed to.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>contributionTypes</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#repositorycontributiontype">[RepositoryContributionType]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, include only the specified types of contributions. The GitHub.com UI uses [COMMIT, ISSUE, PULL_REQUEST, REPOSITORY].</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>includeUserRepositories</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If true, include user repositories.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>isLocked</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters repositories according to whether they have been locked.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#repositoryorder">RepositoryOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for repositories returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>privacy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#repositoryprivacy">RepositoryPrivacy</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters repositories according to privacy.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>repository</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repository">Repository</a></code>)</p></td>

           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>savedReplies</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#savedreplyconnection">SavedReplyConnection</a></code>)</p></td>

              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#savedreplyorder">SavedReplyOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>The field to order saved replies by.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>sponsorsListing</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorslisting">SponsorsListing</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The GitHub Sponsors listing for this user or organization.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>sponsorshipForViewerAsSponsor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorship">Sponsorship</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The viewer's sponsorship of this entity.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>sponsorshipsAsMaintainer</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorshipconnection">SponsorshipConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>This object's sponsorships as the maintainer.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>includePrivate</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Whether or not to include private sponsorships in the result set.</p>
               <p></p> 
               <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#sponsorshiporder">SponsorshipOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for sponsorships returned from this connection. If left blank, the sponsorships will be ordered based on relevancy to the viewer.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>sponsorshipsAsSponsor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#sponsorshipconnection">SponsorshipConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>This object's sponsorships as the sponsor.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2">

               <p></p>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>starredRepositories</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#starredrepositoryconnection">StarredRepositoryConnection!</a></code>)</p></td>

               <p></p>

           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerCanSponsor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not the viewer is able to sponsor this user/organization.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerIsFollowing</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not this user is followed by the viewer.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>viewerIsSponsoring</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>True if the viewer is sponsoring this user/organization.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>watching</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#repositoryconnection">RepositoryConnection!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A list of repositories the given user is watching.</p><p></p> 
             <div class="border rounded-1 mt-3 mb-3 p-3 color-bg-secondary f5"> 
              <p><b>Arguments</b></p> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>affiliations</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#repositoryaffiliation">[RepositoryAffiliation]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Affiliation options for repositories returned from the connection. If none specified, the results will include repositories for which the current viewer is an owner or collaborator, or member.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>after</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>before</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>first</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>isLocked</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters repositories according to whether they have been locked.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>last</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>orderBy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/input-objects#repositoryorder">RepositoryOrder</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Ordering options for repositories returned from the connection.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>ownerAffiliations</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#repositoryaffiliation">[RepositoryAffiliation]</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>Array of owner's affiliation options for repositories returned from the connection. For example, OWNER will include only repositories that the organization or user being viewed owns.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
              <div class="border-top mt-2"> 
               <p class="mt-2"><code>privacy</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/enums#repositoryprivacy">RepositoryPrivacy</a></code>)</p> 
               <p></p>
               <p>If non-null, filters repositories according to privacy.</p>
               <p></p> 
              </div> 
             </div> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>websiteUrl</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A URL pointing to the user's public website/blog.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="usercontenteditedge" class="pt-3"> <a href="#usercontenteditedge">UserContentEditEdge</a> </h3> 
         <p>An edge in a connection.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>cursor</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>node</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#usercontentedit">UserContentEdit</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The item at the end of the edge.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="userstatus" class="pt-3"> <a href="#userstatus">UserStatus</a> </h3> 
         <p>The user's description of what they're currently doing.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>emoji</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>An emoji summarizing the user's status.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>emojiHTML</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#html">HTML</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The status emoji as HTML.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>expiresAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>If set, the status will not be shown after this date.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>id</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#id">ID!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>ID of the object.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>indicatesLimitedAvailability</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this status indicates the user is not fully available on GitHub.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>message</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>A brief message describing what the user is doing.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>organization</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#organization">Organization</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The organization whose members can see this status. If null, this status is publicly visible.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>user</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/objects#user">User!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The user who has this status.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="verifiabledomain" class="pt-3"> <a href="#verifiabledomain">VerifiableDomain</a> </h3> 
         <p>A domain that can be verified or approved for an organization or an enterprise.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div> 
         <h4></h4> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/interfaces#node">Node</a></code></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4>Fields</h4> 
         <table class="fields width-full"> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>createdAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was created.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>databaseId</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#int">Int</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the primary key from the database.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>dnsHostName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The DNS host name that should be used for verification.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>domain</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The unicode encoded domain.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>hasFoundHostName</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether a TXT record for verification with the expected host name was found.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>hasFoundVerificationToken</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether a TXT record for verification with the expected verification token was found.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isApproved</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not the domain is approved.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isRequiredForPolicyEnforcement</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether this domain is required to exist for an organization or enterprise policy to be enforced.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>isVerified</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#boolean">Boolean!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Whether or not the domain is verified.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>owner</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/unions#verifiabledomainowner">VerifiableDomainOwner!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The owner of the domain.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>punycodeEncodedDomain</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#uri">URI!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The punycode encoded domain.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>tokenExpirationTime</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The time that the current verification token will expire.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>updatedAt</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#datetime">DateTime!</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>Identifies the date and time when the object was last updated.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><p><code>verificationToken</code> (<code><a href="/en/graphql/reference/scalars#string">String</a></code>)</p></td> 
            <td><p></p><p>The current verification token for the domain.</p><p></p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div>

            <td><p><code>totalCount</code> (<code><a href="
